akāra ādi varṇa lakṣaṇaḥ śabda ādi nimittaḥ sphoṭa lakṣaṇaḥ
tatra tayoḥ madhye varṇolakṣaṇasya utpattim ucyate

original: ātmasamavetaḥ saṃyogātapūrvonumeyavaśīkṛtyaprabhedānāṃ tattvanuśabdabodhāṅgārāṃ kartavyaṃ icchā bhavati tataḥ prayatnaṃ sa prayatna nimittakāraṇamuttamāṣāṇātsadāyusaṃyogādutpattivyādhikāraṇāt koṣṭhavāyoḥ karma jāyate da ca vāyukumbhe pacchadanu kaṇṭhādaunirgacchanti hṛtkaṇṭhatāluvyādīn pradeśānabhihanti tato'bhighātānantaraṃ sthānasya kaṇṭhādeḥ koṣṭhavāyunā vaha yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tatnimittakāraṇamuttamuttamāṣāṇāt sthānākāśasaṃyogādutpattivyādhikāraṇādvarṇotpattiḥ |
analyzed: ātma samavetaḥ kartavyam icchā bhavati tatas prayatnam sa prayatna nimitta kāraṇam uttama āṣāṇāt sat āyu saṃyogāt utpatti vyādhi kāraṇāt koṣṭha vāyoḥ karma jāyate ca vāyu kumbhe pacchat anu kaṇṭha ādau nirgacchanti hṛd kaṇṭha tālu vyādīn pradeśān abhihanti tatas abhighāta anantaram sthānasya kaṇṭha ādeḥ koṣṭha vāyunā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad nimitta kāraṇam uttam uttama āṣāṇāt vaha yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad nimitta kāraṇam uttam uttama

original: avayavailakṣaṇyo'pi bhedodaṇḍasaṃyogādudaṇḍajate vegabhedamāṣāṇādvegākāśasaṃyogādupajāyate bhedokāśavayogo'utpattivyādhikāraṇam bhedodaṇḍasaṃyogo dravyajanatva vego nimittakāraṇam |
analyzed: avayava ailakṣaṇyaḥ vega bheda māṣāṇāt vega ākāśa saṃyogāt upajāyate vega bheda māṣāṇāt vega ākāśa saṃyogāt upajāyate bheda ukāśa vayogaḥ utpatti vyādhi kāraṇam bhedaḥ udaṇḍa saṃyogaḥ nimitta kāraṇam
śabdaḥ jāyate
śabdāt ca śabda niṣpattim krayati

original: śabdātu saṃyogavibhāganiṣpattāvadrīvīdhvanānamacchancchannānāṃ yathā jalaghoṣyā tadvyavahite deśe vīcyantaramupajāyate tato'pyanyat tato'pyanyadityanena krameṇa vīcīdhvanānāṃ bhavati tathā śabdādutpannāt tadvyavahite deśe śabdāntaraṃ tato'pyanyonyamanāgamanāmābhāvu prāpsyovāpalabdhiriti tato'pyanyat tato'pyanyadityanena krameṇa śabdaghvanānāṃ bhavati |
analyzed: yathā jala ghoṣyā tad vyavahite deśe vīci antaram upajāyate tatas upi anyat tatas upi anyat iti anena krameṇa vīcīdhvanānām bhavati tathā śabdāt utpannāt tad vyavahite deśe śabda antaram tatas upi anyonyam prāpsyā uvāpalabdhiḥ iti tatas upi anyat tatas upi anyat iti anena krameṇa śabda ghvanānām bhavati
śabdam ghana anena śrotra deśe upāgatasya antya śabdasya grahaṇam
nanu eṣā kalpanā kutas vidyudālīyate āha
śrotra śabdayoḥ iti

original: na śrotra śabdadeśamupagacchati nāpi śabdaḥ śrotradeśaṃ tathotpattikramasyāt aprāpsya grahaṇaṃ nāstītyādiṣaṇāṃ prāpyakāritvāt |
analyzed: na śrotra śabda deśam upagacchati na api śabdaḥ śrotra deśam a prāpsya grahaṇam na asti ityādi ṣaṇām prāpya kāri tvāt

original: prakārāntareṇa ghoṣanabdhine ghaṭate dṛṣṭā ca ghoṣadhvanāne svotpattideśe vinaśyatāmapi khvāptaprātisamavedaya tadvyavahite deśe vaduśabdayopārambhaparamparayā deśāntaraprāptiḥ tena śabdaghvanānāḥ kalpyate |
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa ghaṭate dṛṣṭā ca ghoṣa dhvanāne sva utpatti deśe vinaśyatām api tad vyavahite deśe deśa antara prāptiḥ tena śabda ghvanānāḥ kalpyate

original: na cānavasthā yāvaddūraṃ nimittakāraṇabhūtaḥ koṣṭhavāyuranuvartate tāvaddūraṃ śabdaghvanānānuvṛttiḥ |
analyzed: na ca anavasthā yāvat dūram nimitta kāraṇa bhūtaḥ koṣṭha vāyuḥ anuvartate tāvat dūram śabda ghu anānā anuvṛttiḥ
atas eva pratiśabdam śabda anupalambhaḥ koṣṭha vāyu pratīghāta ābhu

original: ato'vaśyaṃ sāgaradhvānādeḥ ghuṇāstenātyantamiha bhāṣyatātparyamāvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ nāparā yuktiruktā ||
analyzed: atas vaśyam sāgara dhvāna ādeḥ ghuṇāḥ tena atyantam iha bhāṣya tātparya māvam vyākhyātam na aparā yuktiḥ uktā
guṇa upabṛṃhita advaitānām yukti yukti prabhāvinaḥ
muni hāraḥ iva su acchaḥ hṛdi cintyaḥ tu asāyukham

original: iti bhaṭṭaśrībhodhavakṛtāyāṃ padārthapraveśanyāyakandalīṭīkāyāṃ guṇapadārthaḥ samāptaḥ ||atha karmapadārthanirūpaṇam |
analyzed: iti bhaṭṭa śrī bhodhava kṛtāyām padārthapraveśanyāyakandalī ṭīkāyām guṇa padārthaḥ samāptaḥ atha karma padārtha nirūpaṇam

original: ekadravyavṛttitvaṃ bāhyakatvaṃ prūtaiṃdravyavṛttitvamaṃ aṇuvācatvaṃ gurutvadravatvaprayatnasaṃyogajatvaṃ svakāryasaṃyogavirodhitvaṃ saṃyogavibhāganirapekṣakāraṇatvam asamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ svaparamaparasamavetakāryāsamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ samānajātīyāsamārambhakatvaṃ dravyānārambhakatvaṃ ca pratiniyatajātīyogitvam |
analyzed: eka dravya vṛtti tvam bāhyaka tvam aṇu vācatvam guru tva drava tva prayatna saṃyoga ja tvam sva kārya saṃyoga virodhi tvam saṃyoga vibhāga nirapekṣa kāraṇa tvam asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam sva param apara samaveta kārya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam samāna jātīya asamārambhaka tvam dravya anārambhaka tvam ca pratiniyata jātī yogi tvam
dvividha guṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam ca viśeṣaḥ
saṃśāraḥ abhidhīyate

original: karmatvaṃ nāma sāmānyam tena bahu sambandha utkṣepaṇādīnāmeva |
analyzed: karma tvam nāma sāmānyam tena bahu sambandhaḥ utkṣepaṇa ādīnām eva

original: ekadravyavṛttatvamu ekadā ekasmin dravye ekameva karma vartate ekaṃ karma ekameva dravye vartate ityekadravyavṛttatvam |
analyzed: eka dravya vṛtta tvam ekadā ekasmin dravye ekam eva karma vartate ekam karma ekam eva dravye vartate iti eka dravya vṛtta tvam

original: yadaikasmin dravye guṇāddrahudravyāyakarmesamavāyaḥ syāt tadā tayoḥ parasparamapratibandhādadviśeṣasaṃyogavibhāgānutpattau saṃyogavibhāgayorapekṣakāraṇaṃ karmatilakṣaṇāhāniḥ syāt |
analyzed: yadā ekasmin dravye guṇāt drahu dravyāya karme samavāyaḥ syāt tadā tayoḥ parasparam apratibandhāt a dviśeṣa saṃyoga vibhāga anutpattau saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ apekṣa kāraṇam syāt
atha api dvayoḥ dravyayoḥ ekam eva tat ekasmāt eva tad dravya saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ utpatteḥ dvitīya kalpanā vaiyarthyam

original: evamekaṃ karma nānekatra vartate ekasya utpattau tatsthāt karmaṇo'pyanyatra calanānupalambhāt |
analyzed: evam ekam karma na an ekatra vartate ekasya utpattau tad sthāt karmaṇā api anyatra calana anupalambhāt

original: yathā vaigātkarme nodvāmidhātatiśeṣaṇatvaṃ naiva saṃyogavibhāgātkarme nodvānādayupacatvamityartheḥ |

original: asamavāyikāraṇatvam yathā guṇānāṃ nimittakāraṇātmakamapi naiva karmaṇām kiṃ tvasamavāyikāraṇa-karmayogya ukteṣaṇāṇernabhāṣyamupaniṣatprabhṛ|

original: tatrokteṣaṇāṃ śarīrāvayaveṣu tatsadṛkṣeṣu ca yaduṣvarmātibhiḥ pradeśaiḥ saṃyogakāraṇamayobhāgibhistat pradeśaiḥ vibhāgakāraṇaṃ kramītyucyate yugasvapracayasaṃyogobhayastadukteṣaṇam||
analyzed: tatra ukta iṣaṇām śarīra avayaveṣu tad sadṛkṣeṣu ca pradeśaiḥ saṃyoga kāraṇam ayaḥ bhāgibhiḥ tat pradeśaiḥ vibhāga kāraṇam kramī iti ucyate yuga sva pracaya saṃyoga ubhayaḥ tat ukta iṣaṇam

original: śarīrāvayaveṣu indrādiṣu tatsadṛkṣeṣu puṣpādiṣu ca yadūṣvarmātibhiḥ pradeśaiḥ saṃyogakāraṇamayobhāgibhiśca vibhāgakāraṇaṃ yugasvasaṃyogapramāṇenaiva krāyate tadukteṣaṇam||
analyzed: śarīra avayaveṣu indra ādiṣu tad sadṛkṣeṣu puṣpa ādiṣu ca pradeśaiḥ saṃyoga kāraṇam ayaḥ bhāgibhiḥ ca vibhāga kāraṇam yuga sva saṃyoga pramāṇena eva krāyate tat ukta īṣaṇam
tad viparīta saṃyoga vibhāga kāraṇam karma upaceyaṇam
tad viparītā iti
ayaḥ dravya saṃyoga kāraṇam ṛṣva reva vibhāga kāraṇam karma upaceyaṇam iti arthaḥ

original: kṣaṇunau dṛśyasyādhārayavānau taddhetauvibhāgaḥ saṃyogasya mūlapradeśordhvena karmaṇādhārayato kuṭilaḥ saṃjāyate tadāpakṣunam||khracuna iti |
analyzed: dṛśyasya ādhāra yavānau tad hetau vibhāgaḥ saṃyogasya mūla pradeśa ūrdhvena karmaṇā ādhāra yataḥ kuṭilaḥ saṃjāyate iti

original: taddvaireyāṣayasabdadrudrākṣāṣādidravyaiḥ sajjāyate iti yena karmaṇeti sambandhaḥ ||
analyzed: sat jāyate iti yena karmaṇā iti sambandhaḥ

original: taddviparyayeṇa saṃyogavibhāgotpattau yena karmaṇā-dhayavī kṛtaḥ sañcayate tatprasāraṇam ||
analyzed: tad viparyayeṇa saṃyoga vibhāga utpattau yena karmaṇā adhayavī kṛtaḥ sañcayate tat prasāraṇam
atha cayanānām mūla pradeśa vibhāga anusareṇa saṃyoga utpattau satyām iti arthaḥ
yat aniyata diś pradeśa saṃyoga vibhāga kāraṇam tat vṛkṣanam iti

original: etatsaṅgrahavidhamapi karma dharīrāvayaveṣu tatsamba-ddheṣu ca sadṛśyasamavetatvatpayaṃ ca yadanyattadvṛttyameva teṣvanyeṣu ca tadvṛkṣanamiti |
analyzed: etat saṅgraha vidham api karma dharīra avayaveṣu tad sambaddheṣu ca sadṛśya samaveta tvad payam ca yat anyat tad vṛttyam eva teṣu anyeṣu ca tat vṛkṣanam iti
karmaṇām jāti pañcaka tvam anuktam gamana ādi śeṣāt

original: sarve hi draviṇike karme gamanamātramutpacya svāśrayasyordhvamadhastiryagvāy-śumārgaiḥ pradeśaiḥ saṃyogavibhāgān karoti sarvatra gamana pratyayo'viśiṣṭastasmādvṛkṣanameva sarvemiti |
analyzed: sarve hi draviṇike karme gamana mātram utpacya sva āśrayasya ūrdhvam adhas tiryak vāyū mārgaiḥ pradeśaiḥ saṃyoga vibhāgān karoti sarvatra gamana pratyayaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt vṛkṣanam eva

original: na vargādyāḥ pratyayānuvṛttivyāhṛtidarśanāt ihotkṣepaṇaṃ patanāpatanaśabdityevamādi sarvatra vargādyāḥ pratyayā-nuvṛttivyāhṛtī dṛṣṭe taddvetuḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhedo-'vagamyate |
analyzed: na varga ādyāḥ pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhṛti darśanāt iha utkṣepaṇam patana āpatana śabda iti evamādi sarvatra varga ādyāḥ pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhṛtī dṛṣṭe tad dvetuḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhedaḥ avagamyate
teṣām udān udāna sarga viśeṣāt siddhuḥ
sarvam api pañca eva iti avadhāraṇa anupapattiḥ
niṣkarmaṇa pradeśa anādiṣu api varga ādyāḥ pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhṛti darśanāt

original: praculotkṣepaṇādiṣu sarvatra vargādyāḥ pratyayānuvṛ-tiṣṭhādyutidarśanājjātibheda iṣyate sarva ca niṣkāmagrāmaveśanādiṣvapi|
analyzed: pracula utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu sarvatra varga ādyāḥ ca niṣkāma grāma veśana ādiṣu api

original: kāryabhedāttu teṣu pratyayānuvṛttivyāhatī iti cet na utkṣepaṇādiṣvapi kāryabhedādeva pratyayānuvṛttivyāhatiprasaṅgaḥ|
analyzed: kārya bhedāt tu teṣu pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhatī iti ced na utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu api kārya bhedāt eva pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhati prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha samāne varge'ḥ pratyayānuvṛttivyāghātisaṅgāve utkṣepaṇādīnāmeva jātibhedo na niṣkāsaṇādīnāmityatra viśeṣaheturaktīti cet jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgāt|
analyzed: atha samāne utkṣepaṇa ādīnām eva jāti bhedaḥ na niṣkāsaṇa ādīnām iti atra viśeṣa hetuḥ akti iti ced jāti saṅkara prasaṅgāt
niṣkāsaṇa ādīnām jāti bhedāt pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhataḥ jāti saṅkaraḥ prasajyate

original: katham dravyauddeśyenotkṣepaṇādupavarakādupavarakāntaraṃ gacchato yugapattiṣṭhanasagrāmaveśanapratyayo dṛśyau tathā dvārapraveśo pratiṣati niṣkāmatīti ca|
analyzed: katham dravya auddeśyena utkṣepaṇāt upavarakāt upavaraka antaram gacchataḥ yugapad tiṣṭhana sa grāma veśana pratyayaḥ dṛśyau tathā dvāra praveśaḥ ca

original: yadā tu pratibīrācayanītaṃ bhavati tadā na praveśanapratyayo nāpi niṣkramaṇapratyayaḥ kintu gamanapratyaya eva bhavati|
analyzed: yadā tu pratibīrā caya nītam bhavati tadā na praveśana pratyayaḥ na api niṣkramaṇa pratyayaḥ kintu gamana pratyayaḥ eva bhavati

original: tathā nālikāyāṃ vaṃśapañjādvau patati bahūnāṃ dravdūṇāṃ yugapadbhramaṇapatanapraveśanapratyayo dṛśya iti jātisaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ|
analyzed: tathā nālikāyām vaṃśa pañjā dvau patati bahūnām dravdūṇām yugapad bhramaṇa patana praveśana pratyayaḥ dṛśyaḥ iti jāti saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ

original: na caivamutkṣepaṇādiṣu pratyayasaṅkaro dṛṣṭaḥ tasmādutkṣepaṇādīnāmeva jātibhedāt pratyayānuvṛttivyāhato niṣkāmaṇādīnāṃ tu kāryabhedāditi|
analyzed: na ca evam utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu pratyaya saṅkaraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt utkṣepaṇa ādīnām eva jāti bhedāt pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāhataḥ niṣkāmaṇa ādīnām tu kārya bhedāt iti
katham yugapad pratyaya bhedaḥ iti ced

original: atha matam yathā jātisaṅkaro nāsti evamanekasamavetamāveśo'pi nāstītyekasmin karmaṇi yugapadūhu dvayāṃ bhramaṇāpatanapraveśanapratyayāḥ kathaṃ bhavantīti|
analyzed: atha matam yathā jāti saṅkaraḥ na asti evam aneka samavetam āveśaḥ api na asti iti ekasmin karmaṇi bhramaṇa āpatana praveśana pratyayāḥ katham bhavanti iti

original: atra brūmaḥ na avayavāvayavinorvivarto vividhaprayoga-vibhāgānāṃ bhedāt‌ |
analyzed: atra brūmaḥ na avayava avayavinoḥ vivartaḥ vividha prayoga vibhāgānām bhedāt

original: yo hi draśya dravayavānāṃ pāśvaitaḥ paryāyeṇa vikramadeśaiḥ saṃyogavibhāgān‌ paśyati tasya bhavanāpratyayo bhavati ye|
analyzed: yaḥ hi drava yavānām pāśvaitaḥ paryāyeṇa vikrama deśaiḥ saṃyoga vibhāgān paśyati tasya bhavanā pratyayaḥ bhavati ye

original: dravayavit‌ ūrdhvamadheṣorvibhāga mayaḥ saṃyogaṃ cāvekṣate tasya patanapratyayo bhavati |

original: tatsambaddheṣvapi kathamu yadā hastena mudgalaṃ gṛhītveccho karoti utkṣipāmi hastena mudgalamititadanantaraṃ prayatnasapekṣamāṇādātmahastasaṃyogāccalitraiva kāle haste utkṣepaṇakarmotpadyate tasminnaiva kāle  tveva prayatnasapekṣamāṇāduttamukhalasaṃyogāt subale  api karmoti |

original: tato durasutpanne subale tadarthecchā  nivartate punarāpyapadeśaparokṣotpadyate tadanantaraṃ prayatnatsa mapekṣamāṇācayoktāt saṃyogāduttamukhalayoryugapadupa kṣepaṇakarmaṇī bhavata: tato'nyena subalakarmaṇo'tyabala subalayorabhighātākhya: saṃyoga: kriyate sa saṃyogo'nuba lagatavegamapekṣamāṇo'pratyayaṃ subale utpatanakarma karo ti |
analyzed: tatas subale tad artha icchā nivartate punar āpi apadeśa parokṣā utpadyate tad anantaram saṃyogāt uttamukhalayoḥ yugapad upa kṣepaṇa karmaṇī bhavata tatonyena subala karmaṇā utyabala subalayoḥ abhighāta ākhya saṃyoga kriyate sa saṃyogaḥ unubala gata vegam apekṣamāṇaḥ pratyayam subale utpatana karma

original: tatkarmābhighātāpekṣaṃ subale saṃskāramārabhate tasmaye ccha subalahastasaṃyogo'pratyayaṃ haste'pyutpatanakarma karo ti|

original: yadyapi prāktana: saṃskāri vinaṣṭa: tathāpi subalotpu tvalayo: saṃyoga: padukarmotpādaka: saṃyogaviśeṣabhāvāt  tasya saṃskārārambho sācivyasamartho bhavati |

analyzed: saṃskāravati puna saṃskāra ārambhaḥ na asti atas yasmin kāle saṃskāra apekṣāt abhighātāt ya tyayam subale utpatana karma tasmin na eva kāle tam eva sam skāram apekṣamāṇāt subala hasta saṃyogāt apratyayam haste kārya madhye ghana tva yaktam anicchupuḥ

original: hastamudyamyamicchanti tadā hastalaghutvātmapradeśe prayatno jāyate taṃ prayatnaṃ nimittakāraṇamupādānamāṇādātmahastasaṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇādudravye kāryaṃ bhavati gha hastādi prayatne gurutvabahigatatva utkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇayorapakṣakṣaṇānyanādṛguṇatvasyāpi kā raṇatvam |
analyzed: hastam udyamyam icchanti tadā hasta laghu tva ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ jāyate tam prayatnam nimitta kāraṇam upādāna māṇāt ātma hasta saṃyogāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt udravye kāryam bhavati gha hasta ādi prayatne guru tva bahi gata tve utkṣepaṇa apakṣepaṇayoḥ apakṣa kṣaṇa anya nādṛ guṇa tvasya api kā raṇa tvam
pādya ādiṣu ga tīre vā iti

original: pādai karmotpattau pāda śaktyātmapradeśe prayatno nimittakāraṇam pādātmasaṃyogo'samavāyikāraṇam |
analyzed: karma utpattau pāda śakti ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ nimitta kāraṇam pāda ātma saṃyogaḥ usamavāyi kāraṇam
pūrvam kharu eva śarīra laghu prayatni yatnau dṛṣṭavyau

original: śarīrakriyotpattāvapi śarīrātmasaṃyo go'samavāyikāraṇam śarīradātmapradeśe prayatno nimittakāraṇam |
analyzed: śarīra kriyā utpattau api śarīra ātma saṃyaḥ go samavāyi kāraṇam śarīra da ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ nimitta kāraṇam

original: tatsvabhāvadṛṣṭe  śarīrakhandṛṣṭe śarīralaghuprayatnandṛṣṭeṣvapi kāryaṃ karmotpattiriti praṣṭavyaḥ |
analyzed: tad svabhāva dṛṣṭe

original: yadā  hastena subalaṃ gṛhītvocchāṃ karoti utkṣipāmi hastena subalaṃ'miti |
analyzed: yadā hastena su balam gṛhītvā ucchām karoti utkṣipāmi hastena su balam iti

original: tadyannataraṃ  lakṣyā icchāyā janantaraṃ prayatno hastena subalamuccheṣutvāpāmiti hastasubalayo rmadhyagurutveṇecchātaḥ prayatno jāyamānaḥ tayormadhyagurutveṇasamavāyo viśiṣṭa eva  jāyate taṃ prayatnaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ nimittamupādānamāṇādātmahastasaṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇā dyātmaneva kāle haste utkṣepaṇakarmotpadyate tasminneva kāle tadeva prayatnasuvalayo rgurutvaprayatnamāṇāduttamasubalasaṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇāt subale'pi karma bhavati  kāraṇayogapadyāt tato dūrabhūtvam subale taducchā nivartate utkṣepaṇecchā niva rtate punaraprayatneṇecchātyavate hastena subalatyāpakṣepaṇecchāpajāyate ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: tat yannataram lakṣyāḥ icchāyāḥ prayatnaḥ hastena subalam uccheṣu tvāpām iti hasta subalayoḥ madhya guru tveṇa icchātaḥ prayatnaḥ jāyamānaḥ tayoḥ madhya guru tveṇa samavāyaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ eva jāyate tam prayatnam viśiṣṭam nimittam upādāna māṇāt ātma hasta saṃyogāt asamavāyi kāraṇāt yā ātmanā iva kāle haste utkṣepaṇa karma utpadyate tasmin eva kāle tat eva prayatna suvalayoḥ guru tva prayatna māṇāt uttama subala saṃyogāt asamavāyi

original: tadyannataraṃ prayatna yo'pi jāyamānaḥ utkṣeṇaprayatnavat viśiṣṭa eva jāyate taṃ ca  prayatnamupādānamāṇādyotkāt saṃyogādudyādātmahastasaṃyogāduttamasubalasaṃyogādutta mubalayorgurutvaprayatneṇakarmaṇo bhavataḥ tato'nyena subalakarmaṇā utkabalasubalayo rmithyātmakaḥ saṃyogaḥ kriyate |
analyzed: tat yannataram jāyamānaḥ utkṣeṇa prayatna vat viśiṣṭaḥ eva jāyate tam ca prayatnam upādāna māṇa ādya utkāt saṃyogāt udyāt ātma hasta saṃyogāt uttama subala saṃyogāt uttamu balayoḥ guru tva prayatneṇa karmaṇaḥ bhavataḥ tatonyena subala karmaṇā utka bala subalayoḥ mithyā ātmakaḥ saṃyogaḥ kriyate

original: apakṣipya subalatyāntaścena karmaṇā utkabalasu balasambandhau subalatyotpannahetuḥ saṃyogaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: apakṣipya su bala tyā antaścena karmaṇā bala sambandhau su bala tyā utpanna hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ kriyate iti arthaḥ

original: sa saṃyogo subalagataṃ  vegamavegamāṇau pratyayamaprayatnapūrvake subale unyatakarma karoti vego nimittakāraṇaṃ  subalaṃ samavāyikāraṇam |
analyzed: sa saṃyogaḥ su bala gatam vegam avegamāṇau pratyayam aprayatna pūrvake su bale unyata karma karoti vegaḥ nimitta kāraṇam su balam samavāyi kāraṇam

original: tatkarmotpadyātāparyaṃ subale saṃskārarambhate utpatana karmaṃ tvakāraṇamabhidyātmakaṃ saṃyogamupādānamāṇaṃ subale vegamārabhate |
analyzed: subale subale karmam tu akāraṇam abhidya ātmakam saṃyogam upādānamāṇam subale vegam ārabhate

original: taṃ saṃskāramupā daya ittasubalasaṃyogo'samavāyikāraṇameto'pratyayamaprayatnapūrvakaṃ hastepyupatana karmaṃ karoti yo'yaṃ prākteno'pyeṣaṇaparamparā prayuñjagataḥ yo'pyabhidhyātatādiguṇaḥ  tadabhāve kāryaṃ subale'pratyayamapyatanakarmotpatanavegakāramārabhate cāpekṣākāraṇā bhāvādana kāhaṃ |
analyzed: tam saṃskāram upa karmam karoti yā iyam prāk tena upi eṣaṇa paramparā tad abhāve kāryam kāryam kāryam kāram kāram kāram ca apekṣā kāraṇā kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram kāram

original: yadyapi prāktanaḥ saṃskāro vinaṣṭaḥ tathāpi subalotkabalasaṃyogaḥṣaṭkarmopadeśamādhye  padmanābho'vadat: ṣaṭkārajanakarmopyavadat: krataḥ saṃyogaviśeṣamātrāt kuṃyo: gaviśeṣatvādu kriyato yaccaiva tatkāha |
analyzed: yadi api prāktanaḥ saṃskāraḥ vinaṣṭaḥ tathā api subala utka bala saṃyogaḥ ṣaṭkarma upadeśa mādhye padmanābhaḥ uvadat ṣaṭkāra janakarmā upi avadat saṃyoga viśeṣa mātrāt kriyataḥ yat ca eva yat ca eva

original: tasya krameṇa: ṣaṭkārātmano kartavya vāvidyāsamadhau bhavati |
analyzed: tasya krameṇa ṣaṣ kāra ātmanaḥ bhavati
śāhāyye samadhau bhavati
cālaneṣu pake hasta mukhalayoḥ cālanana krameṇau krameṇa bhavataḥ
āśu bhāvāt tu yogapadya mahaṇāt
prakāra antaram āha

original: athavā prāktana eva paṭhaḥ saṃskārābhighātādaviṣayatvacitsthita iti viśiṣṭakāyajanyādiniyamaḥ: ṣaṃskāraḥ svadhaivṛddhamavya saṃyogenāpi na vinaśyati ataḥ saṃskārati saṃskārāntarasmadhau nāsti yataḥ prāktanāpekṣāṇaṃsaṃskāro na jighraḥ ataḥ prāktanasaṃskāravati sukhale saṃskārāntārasmadhau nāsti iti pratīyate |
analyzed: athavā prāktanaḥ eva paṭhaḥ saṃskāra abhighātāt aviṣaya tva cit sthitaḥ iti viśiṣṭa kāya janya ādi niyamaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃyogena api na vinaśyati atas na asti yatas na jighraḥ atas prāktana saṃskāravati sukhale na asti iti pratīyate

original: yasmin kāle saṃskārāpaghātamighātādāpratyayaṃ sukhale utpattanakrame tasminneva kāle tameva saṃskārapreṣamāṇādattanusukhasaṃyogapadyapratyayaṃ haste'pyutpattanakrameti |
analyzed: yasmin kāle sukhale utpattana krame tasmin eva kāle tam eva saṃskāra preṣamāṇā datta nu sukha saṃyoga padya pratyayam haste pi utpattana krama iti
cālaneṣu pake hasta sukha leyoḥ utpattana krameṇa auvekṣa tvam eva yogapadyam
pāṇi su khaleṣu gamana vidhiḥ

original: kaṃcanu yadā tomaraṃ hastena gṛhītvotkṣiptumicchettyajate tadanantaraṃ prathamaḥ tatpayekṣamāṇātthasyotkṣāt saṃyoganuddhyāt tomarahastayoryugapadākṣepaṇakarmaṇau bhavataḥ |
analyzed: kaṃcanu yadā tomaram hastena gṛhītvā utkṣiptum icchet tyajate tad anantaram prathamaḥ saṃyoga tomara hastayoḥ yugapad ākṣepaṇa karmaṇau bhavataḥ

original: prakṣārite ca haste tadākarṣaṇāthaiḥ prathamo nivartate tadanantaraṃ tiryagūrdhvaṃ dūramārvaṃ vā kṣipāmītīcchā sajjāyate tadanantaraṃ tadyuktaḥ prayattastatpayekṣamāṇāstomarahastasaṃyogā nodanākhyāḥ tasmāt tomare karmotpannaṃ nodanāpekṣaṃ tasmin saṃskāramātrasave tataḥ saṃskāranodanārthau tādṛśu karmāṇi bhavanti yāvaduktatomaravibhāga iti tato vibhāgānodane nivṛtte saṃskārādūrdhvaṃ tiryagadūramārvaṃ vā prayatnānukūlapāṇi karmāṇi bhavantyāpatanāditi ||pāṇimuktau gamanavidhiḥ|
analyzed: prakṣārite ca haste tad ākarṣaṇa athaiḥ prathamaḥ nivartate tad anantaram tiryak ūrdhvam dūram ārvam vā kṣipāmi iti icchā sat jāyate tad anantaram tad yuktaḥ prayattaḥ tad payekṣamāṇāḥ tomara hasta saṃyogāḥ nodana ākhyāḥ tasmāt tomare karma utpannam nodana apekṣam tasmin saṃskāra mātra save tatas saṃskāra nodana arthau karmāṇi bhavanti yāvat ukta tomara vibhāgaḥ iti tatas vibhāga ānodane nivṛtte saṃskārāt ūrdhvam tiryak adūram ārvam vā
katham pāṇimuktau dravyasya gamana vidhiḥ

original: gamanasaṃ kāraḥ kathamanuvartate iti praśne kṛte brūmaḥāhu|
analyzed: kāraḥ katham anuvartate iti praśne kṛte brūmaḥ āhu
yat vā tomara ādibhiḥ
sūtra pada ākṣepe ṇa iti
karma karaṇa u tve pi upasthita tvāt
prathamaḥ nivartate iti
tayoḥ ekataraḥ satyoḥ ākṣepa prayojana prathamaḥ nivartate na advis iti prathama ārādhya prathama utpāda ādi vacaneḥ
tat anantaram iti

original: pravāraṇānantaraṃ niṣeṇuprathame vā drutamāghaṭṭe vā kṣipāmītīcchātmakena tadanantaraṃ tadanurūpaḥ prathamaḥ tiryakūrdhvamadhaścādhāṃ tiryakūrdhvamadhaḥprathamo jñāyate iti jñāte'pyakādhāṃsuṣṭhe'pyadhaḥprathamo jñāyate dūradeśe 'dhvānaṃ maṅktvā prathamaḥ ākarṣaṇe'pyākāśe ca vidhivat|
analyzed: pravāraṇa anantaram niṣeṇu prathame vā drutam āghaṭṭe vā kṣipāmi iti icchā ātmakena tad anantaram tad anurūpaḥ prathamaḥ tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca adhām tiryak ūrdhvam adhas prathamaḥ jñāyate iti dūra deśe dhvānam maṅktvā prathamaḥ ākarṣaṇe ipi ākāśe ca vidhivat
prathamaḥ jñāyate iti tad anurūpa śabda athaiḥ

original: tatra ṇeṣamāṇastomarahastasaṃyogo nodanākhyo nākhyasya tomarasya nodakatva ca hastasya khar̤āyamane hetutvāt tasyānodanākhyatvayoktādicchānurūpaprathamādi bhāve tomare kramotpattau tatkarme nodanāpekṣaṃ sadvittu tomare saṃskāramārabhate|
analyzed: tatra ṇeṣamāṇaḥ tomara hasta saṃyogaḥ nodana ākhyaḥ na ākhyasya tomarasya ca hastasya khara āyamane hetu tvāt bhāve tomare krama utpattau nodana apekṣam sat vid tu tomare saṃskāram ārabhate
nataḥ khaḍgāḥ reti

original: tomarasya etatvaṃ yāhamu khaḍgāranurūpāṇi kramāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ||
analyzed: tomarasya khaḍgāḥ ranurūpāṇi kramāṇi bhavanti iti arthaḥ
tathā yantra mukteṣu

original: kṣayadyu yo vajra yānū kṣatavyāyāmau kṣāmyena kṣureṇa(2) dhanuvidyusya dakṣiṇena yārye caryāya saṃghaṭarāṃ jyāṃ sṛuṣṭenā yṛhītvā ākarṣaṇecchāṃ karīrāti vajjyeṣṭhākarṣaṇāstrītahanuriti|
analyzed: kṣaya dyu yaḥ kṣata vyāyāmau kṣāmyena dhanuvidyusya dakṣiṇena caryāya saṃghaṭarām jyām sṛuṣṭena ā yṛhītvā ākarṣaṇa icchām iti

original: tadanantaraṃ prathamastanapekṣamāṇādātmāhustasaṃyogādākra ṣeṇākarme haste yadevotpadyate tadaiva tameva prathamasta pekṣamāṇādāhustakṣepāṇaparasaṃyogād jyāyāṃ yāre ca karme prathamavidhiṣṭahastajyākṣarasaṃyogasapekṣamāṇāsaryāṃ jyā koṭisaṃyogāsyāṃ karmaṇo bhavato dhanuśkojyorityetat sarvaṃ yugapat|
analyzed: tad anantaram haste yat eva utpadyate tadā eva tam eva prathamaḥ ta pekṣamāṇāt āhusta kṣepa āṇa para saṃyogāt jyāyām ca karme jyā koṭi saṃyogā asyām karmaṇaḥ bhavataḥ dhanuḥ kojyoḥ iti etat sarvam yugapad

original: evamākarṣaṇādākṣepe dhanuṣi nātaḥ pura tatena(3) gantavyamiti yajjñānaṃ tatpūrvadākṣepeṇārthe sya prathamasya vināśastataḥ punarnodbodhyā sṛjjā yate tadanantaraṃ prathamastanapekṣamāṇādātmāhutpikṣayogāṅkulitvapuraṃ hastātsvāṅguṣṭhāgrairniṣīdatibhāga:|
analyzed: evam ākarṣaṇāt ākṣepe dhanuṣi na atas pura gantavyam iti yat jñānam prathamasya vināśaḥ tatas punar na udbodhyā yate tad anantaram hastāt sva aṅguṣṭha agraiḥ niṣīdati bhāga

original: tato vibhāgāt sarveṣāmaṅguṣṭhāgrā: sthiteṣu vinyaste pratibandhakāmābādhvadrā yanubi darśalāñ: sthitisthāpaka: saṃskāro maṇḍalībhūtaṃ dhanuryethāvasthitaṃ sthāpayati tadā tameva saṃskāramapekṣamāṇā hanuyuktāṅguyogājjyāyāṃ śare ca kramotsṛjyate tatsaṃskāraṇāpūrvaṃ jyāyāṃ saṃskāraṃ karoti tatpaścātmāṇe iṣujyādiyogo nodanaṃ tasmādviṣāvāṇaṃ karma lohanāpekṣākṣipro saṃskāramātmate|
analyzed: tatas vibhāgāt sarveṣām aṅguṣṭha agrā sthiteṣu vinyaste sthiti sthāpaka saṃskāraḥ maṇḍalībhūtam dhanuḥ yethāvasthitam sthāpayati tadā tam eva saṃskāram apekṣamāṇā hanu yuktā aṅgu yogāt jyāyām śare ca kramā utsṛjyate jyāyām saṃskāram karoti tat paścāt iṣu jyā ādi yogaḥ nodanam tasmāt viṣāvāṇam karma saṃskāram ātmate

original: tasmāt saṃskārātroḍhanasahāyāt tābat karmāṇi bhavanti yāvadiṣujyādisāmagrī tribhāgānvicute nodane karmaṇyuttarottarāṇīṣusaṃskārā devapatanāditi|
analyzed: tasmāt karmāṇi bhavanti yāvat iṣu jyā ādi sāmagrī tri bhāga anvicute nodane karmaṇi uttarottarāṇi iṣu saṃskārāḥ deva patanāt iti

original: bahūni karmāṇi kramaśa: kramāt saṃyogabahutvāt yuktastu saṃskāro'ntarāle karmayogāpekṣākāraṇābhāvāditi||
analyzed: bahūni karmāṇi kramaśas kramāt saṃyoga bahu tvāt yuktaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ antarāle karma yoga apekṣā kāraṇa abhāvāt iti

original: kṛtavyāghāta: kṛtānugrāhyādau śamena kareṇa prajanitrīcu gādaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena śaraṃ vacyagraṃ jyāyāṃ śaraṃ saṃyojya sadharma jyā|
analyzed: kṛta vyāghāta kṛta anugrāhya ādau śamena kareṇa gādam gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena śaram jyāyām śaram saṃyojya jyā

original: śareṇa yaha vartamānāṃ jvāṃ mukttvā gṛhītvā paccāt karoti paścotkṣipteṇāntenānuvṛtti|
analyzed: śareṇa vartamānām jvām mukttvā gṛhītvā paccāt karoti

original: jyoti dhanurmukhyāsyā dhanuriti śastrābhidhānam jyā ca iṣuśca jeṣe saha jeṣujyā vartate iti saṅgrahadhanuraṭaśakriyāsamīcīnachāyā ākāro dakṣiṇa:|
analyzed: dhanuḥ mukhyā asyāḥ dhanuḥ iti śastra abhidhānam jyā ca iṣuḥ ca jeṣe saha jeṣu jyā vartate iti saṅgraha dhanuḥ aṭaśa kriyā samīcīna chāyā ākāraḥ dakṣiṇa

original: tadanantaraṃ prayatnamapekṣamāṇādātmahastasaṃyogādaṅguṣṭhāṅgule haste yadaivātmaghāte tadaiva taṃ prayatnamapekṣamāṇādastajyāśarasaṃyogājjyāyāṃ śare ca karma hastaśarasaṃyogāt prayatnaviśiṣṭajyāhastasaṃyogāmapekṣamāṇābhyāṃ jyākṣeṭiyogābhyāṃ karmaṇo dhanukkodyotiti|
analyzed: tad anantaram prayatnam apekṣamāṇāt ātma hasta saṃyogāt aṅguṣṭha aṅgule haste yadā eva ātma ghāte tadā eva tam prayatnam apekṣamāṇāt asta jyā śara saṃyogāt jyāyām śare ca karma hasta śara saṃyogāt prayatna viśiṣṭa jyā hasta saṃyogām apekṣamāṇābhyām jyā kṣeṭi yogābhyām karmaṇaḥ
etat sarvam yagapad kāraṇa yoga pradyāt

original: evamākṣepādaṅkure dhanurvi nāta: śaramena hastena gṛhṇatyamiti pratyajāṃ tasmāt tadākṣepaṇeyereti dhanurākṣepaṇādhesya prayatnasya vināśa iti|
analyzed: evam ākṣepāt aṅkure dhanuḥ vi śaramena hastena gṛhṇati amiti prati ajām tasmāt prayatnasya vināśaḥ iti

original: tata: śarasya guṇasya ca mokṣaṇecchā ca tadanantaraṃ prayatno mokṣaṇāye: tatpaścātmāṇādātmahastasaṃyogādaṅgu-karmendriya prātyakṣakarmanirdeśaṇam |
analyzed: tata śarasya guṇasya ca mokṣaṇa icchā ca tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tad paścāt ātmāṇāt ātma hasta saṃyogāt aṅgu karmendriya prātyakṣa karma nirdeśaṇam

original: liṅgadehe tattvācchāyākṛtivibhāgāḥ śaraguṇākhyāśca tato vibhāgācchruṇādvisaṃyogavibhāgayatvamityanuṃ saṃyoge vinaṣṭe pratibandhakābhāvācchudā yanuṣi calemānaḥ sthitisthāpakaḥ saṃskāro bhūyaṣṭhlībhūtaṃ yanuṣayāvasthitaṃ sthāpayati sa saṃskāraprabandhamāśudurbodhayogācchāyāyā śre ca kramotpadyate tatkṣame tvaṅkāraṇāpūrvaṃ yanuṣordhayogāpūrvaṃ cchāyāṃ saṃskāraṃ vegākhyaṃ karoti taṃ ca saṃskāramapekṣamāṇā chuñjyādayogo nodanaṃ nairāśyeṣornodakasya guṇasya vahvagamanahetutvādū tasmāttu nodanodanāvācya krame saṃskāramārabhate tasmāttu saṃskārāt nodanaghaṅkāyātū sākṣāt kramoṇi bhavanti yāvadicchāvabhimāno vibhāgādivṛtte nodane kramoṇi uttarāṇi saṃskārādeva vegākhyādudbhavanti yāvatpatanamiṣṭotpatteśca ca pāto gurutvanimittañcaksaṃskārañcayātū|
analyzed: liṅga dehe tattvāt chāyā ākṛti vibhāgāḥ śara guṇa ākhyāḥ ca tatas saṃyoge vinaṣṭe pratibandhaka abhāvāt śudā yanuṣi calemānaḥ sthiti sthāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ sthāpayati sa saṃskāra prabandham āśu durbodha yogāt chāyāyāḥ ca kramā utpadyate tad kṣame chāyām saṃskāram vega ākhyam karoti tam ca saṃskāram apekṣa api ca saṃskāram apekṣa api ca saṃskāram apekṣa api ca saṃskāram apekṣa api ca saṃskāram apekṣa api ca saṃskāram ape
atha codyati
vahūni kramoṇi kramaśas kasmāt iti

original: vyabhicāreṇyogottarāle kramaśo bahūni kramoṇi bhavantīti kasmāt kalpyate yakrameva karma kuto na kalpyatāmityabhiprāyaḥ |
analyzed: kramaśas bahūni bhavanti iti kasmāt kalpyate yakram eva karma kutas na kalpyatām iti abhiprāyaḥ
yathā āyate
saṃyoga bahu tvāt iti

original: uttarasaṃyogāntaṃ karmetyavasthitaṃ tripratyeśottarāle bahavaḥ saṃyogā dṛśyante tena bahūni kramoṇi bhavantītyāśrīyate |
analyzed: uttara saṃyoga antam karma iti avasthitam tri pratyeśa uttarāle bahavaḥ saṃyogāḥ dṛśyante tena bahūni bhavanti iti āśrīyate

original: yatkṛttu ṣaṭkoṭoruttarāle karmaṇo'pyavākāraṇābhāvāt nodanāmighātayoruttararūpeṣu karma saṃskāramārabhate na karmamātraṃ vegākhyābhāvāt|
analyzed: yat kṛt tu ṣaṣ koṭoḥ uttarāle karmaṇā upi ava a kāraṇa abhāvāt noda nāmighātayoḥ uttara rūpeṣu karma saṃskāram ārabhate na karma mātram vega ākhyā abhāvāt

original: na cvāntarāle nodanaṃ nābhyamighātastatkāle ka pratha śarajyāyogāyeṣu śarakarmaṇā prathame kṛto viśiṣṭaḥ saṃskāro yāvatpatanamanuvartate yathā yathā cāsya kāryakaraṇacchaktiḥ kṣīyate tathā tathā kārye mandataratamādikrameṇvasupyajāyate yathā tarottaraṇasya phale prakṛṣyate upakṛṣyate ca jīryeccha ||
analyzed: na nodanam na abhi amighātaḥ tad kāle śara karmaṇā prathame kṛtaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ yāvat patanam anuvartate yathā yathā ca asya kārya karaṇa chaktiḥ kṣīyate tathā tathā kārye yathā tara uttaraṇasya phale prakṛṣyate upakṛṣyate ca jīrya iccha
evam ātma amihiteṣu bāhyeṣu api adhyātmyam na kalpīkam

original: anabhihiteṣu bāhyeṣu catuṣu jalapavanatejapratyayaṃ karma gamanameva nodanādibhyo bhavati |
analyzed: anabhihiteṣu bāhyeṣu catuṣu jala pavana teja pratyayam karma gamanam eva nodana ādibhyaḥ bhavati
tad vibhāgaḥ guru tva drava tva vega prayatnāt nānā

original: ca saṃyogaviśeṣo nādanajavibhāgahetorakṣasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam tasmādbahutvepi mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati |
analyzed: ca saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ nādana ja vibhāga hetoḥ akṣasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam tasmāt bahu tve pi mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati
upapaharati
yat iti

original: anabhihiteṣu bāhyeṣu catuṣu mahābhūteṣātmayaṃ gamanameva nodanādibhyo bhavati cātmanā cathāyāraṇa dharmatvintanā mi-dvitīyaṃ sāṅkhyoktamanupūrvakaṃ gamanātmakameva karma bhavati notkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇādikamityapi: |
analyzed: anabhihiteṣu bāhyeṣu catuṣu mahābhūteṣu ātmayam gamanam eva nodana ādibhyaḥ bhavati ca ātmanā sāṅkhya uktam anupūrvakam gamana ātmakam eva karma bhavati na utkṣepaṇa apakṣepaṇa ādikam iti api
mahāpralaye nodana ādibhyaḥ karma bhavati iti uktam
atha kim nodanam atra āha

original: tatra nodanaṃ gurutvadravatvāpekṣavegāt samastavyastātsanvāno ya: saṃyogaviśeṣa: kartuśca saṃyogaviśeṣo nodanamucyate tatrāha |
analyzed: tatra nodanam guru tva drava tva apekṣa vegāt samasta vyastāt sanvānaḥ ya saṃyoga viśeṣa kartuḥ ca saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ nodanam ucyate tatra āha
nodanam a vibhāga heto karmaṇa kāraṇam iti

original: nodyanodakayo: parasparavibhāgaṃ na karoti pratyakṣaṃ tasya kāraṇaṃ nodanam ||
analyzed: nodya nodakayoḥ paraspara vibhāgam na karoti pratyakṣam tasya kāraṇam nodanam
yathā paṅka sthāyām pṛthivyām

original: vegāpekṣo ya: saṃyogaviśeṣo vibhāgahetorekasya karmaṇa: kāraṇaṃ so'bhighāta: |
analyzed: vega apekṣaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ vibhāga hetoḥ ekasya karmaṇa kāraṇam

original: tasmādapi caturṣu mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati yathā pāṣāṇādiṣu nihure vastunyabhighātiteṣu tathā pādādibhiranucamānāyāmabhihanyamānāyāṃ vā paṅkasthāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ ya: saṃyogo nodanamabhighātayoranyatarapekṣa ubhayāpekṣo vā sa saṃyuktasaṃyoga: tasmādapi pṛthivyādiṣu karma bhavati |
analyzed: tasmāt api caturṣu mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati yathā pāṣāṇa ādiṣu vastuni abhighātiteṣu tathā pāda ādibhiḥ anucamānāyām abhihanyamānāyām vā paṅka sthāyām pṛthivyām yaḥ saṃyogaḥ nodanam abhighātayoḥ anyatara apekṣaḥ ubhaya apekṣaḥ vā sa saṃyukta saṃyoga tasmāt api pṛthivī ādiṣu karma bhavati

original: ye ca pradeśā na nudyante nāpyabhihanyante teṣvapi karma jāyate|
analyzed: ye ca pradeśāḥ na nudyante na api abhihanyante teṣu api karma jāyate
sati guru tvāt vaha dhas gamanam
yathā subala śarīra ādidṛktam
tatra api guru tva addhi dvitīya ādīni tu guru tva saṃskāra apekṣām

original: kimuktaṃ syādanena saṃyogena yaha nodako nodaṃya nodayati nānyathā tenārthaṃ nodanamucyate nodanaṃ tu na karmakāraṇamāha |
analyzed: kim uktam syāt anena saṃyogena na udakaḥ nodayati na anyathā tena artham nodanam ucyate nodanam tu na karma kāraṇam āha
yathā paṅka sthāyām pṛthivyām iti

original: yadā paṅkasthopari mandavyavasthāyito prastarapuṭikā kṣamya: pūrvena samartho sakṣāti tadā gurutvāpekṣa: prastarapuṭsaṃyogo nodanam |
analyzed: yadā prastara puṭikā prastara puṭikā tadā guru tva apekṣa prastara puṭ saṃyogaḥ nodanam

original: yadā prayatnena dūrasthutyācca prastaro'bhihanyate paṅkastadā gurutvaprayatnavegāpekṣa: saṃyogo nodanaṃ yadā jalenāhanyate tadā samastāpekṣa: saṃyogo, nodanamiti yathāsambhavamuhyamiti ||karmaṇyaśva pratyakṣakarmanirūpaṇam |
analyzed: yadā prayatnena dūra sthutyāt ca prastaraḥ abhihanyate paṅkaḥ tadā guru tva prayatna vega apekṣa saṃyogaḥ nodanam yadā jalena āhanyate tadā samasta apekṣa saṃyogaḥ nodanam iti yathāsambhavam uhyam iti karmaṇi aśva pratyakṣa karma nirūpaṇam

original: kegoṣṭhau ya: saṃyoga ekasya vibhāgakṛta: karmaṇa: kāraṇaṃ so'pekṣavāt:  kṣityavāyvagnivātakayo: parasparavibhāgo yata: karmaiṇo jāyate tasyaivaikasya hetuvai:  saṃyogaviśeṣa: so'pekṣavāt: tasmādapi bahuṣu mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati|
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ ekasya vibhāga kṛta karmaṇa kāraṇam sopekṣavāt kṣiti avāyu agni vātakayoḥ paraspara vibhāgaḥ jāyate tasya eva ekasya saṃyoga viśeṣa tasmāt api bahuṣu mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati
yathā pāṣā ṇa ādiṣu nirdūre vastuni abhiṣātiteṣu

original: nodanaṃ parasparāvibhāgahetorevaikasya karmaṇa: kā raṇaṃ na parasparavibhāgaheto: kṣayamagnivāto'pi parasparavibhāgahetorevaikasya karmaṇa:  kāraṇaṃ na parasparāvibhāgahetorityanumeyaksya karmaṇa: kāraṇam |
analyzed: nodanam paraspara avibhāga hetoḥ eva ekasya karmaṇaḥ kā raṇam na paraspara vibhāga hetoḥ kṣayam agni vātaḥ api paraspara vibhāga hetoḥ eva ekasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam na paraspara avibhāga hetoḥ iti anumeyaksya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam
saṃyukta saṃyogam vyākhyam
pāda ādibhiḥ na ṛ ś amānāyām iti

original: ekaśca pṛthivyāṃ pādena nudyamānoyāma bhihanyamānāyāṃ vā ye pradeśā na tudyante nāpyabhihanyante teṣvapi karma dṛśyate|
analyzed: ekaḥ ca pṛthivyām pādena nudyamānaḥ yāma abhihanyamānāyām vā ye pradeśāḥ na tudyante na api abhihanyante teṣu api karma dṛśyate

original: tatra  kṣatātaṃ pradeśāntarāṇāṃ nudyamānābhihanyamānapradeśai: saha saṃyuktameva saṃyoga:  kāraṇam |
analyzed: tatra kṣatātam pradeśa antarāṇām nudyamāna abhihanyamāna pradeśaiḥ saha saṃyuktam eva saṃyoga kāraṇam

original: yathābhiyātakaṃ durvaṃ bhūpradeśamabhihatya kiṃciduddeśaṃ notpatati tatra  pradeśāntarakriyāyāmuṣayāṇeta saṃyuktasaṃyogo hetu: ||
analyzed: yathā abhiyātakam bhū pradeśam abhihatya kiṃcid uddeśam na utpatati tatra saṃyukta saṃyogaḥ
guru tvasya karma kāraṇa tvam āha
pṛthivī avakāśayoḥ eka tva vidhārakam saṃyogāḥ ya tvena abhāve guru tvāt ca tyogamanam tattvanam
yathā muñja tagarīra jva ādi śūnyam

original: gurutvapratibandhakasya hastasaṃyogasyābhāve mṛgalasya yadyogamanaṃ tattvanaṃ  gurutvādudbhūti |
analyzed: guru tva pratibandhakasya hasta saṃyogasya abhāve mṛgalasya yat yogamanam tat tvanam guru tvāt udbhūti

original: evaṃ gurutvavidhārakaṃpravāhābhāve śarīrasya patanaṃ ciṣprayogā ntarāve vegābhāvāt patanaṃ gurutvāt |
analyzed: evam guru tva vidhārakaṃ pravāha abhāve śarīrasya patanam ciṣprayogā antarāve vega abhāvāt patanam guru tvāt

original: tatrācaṃ kutre gurutvād dvitīyādauni tu  gurutvasaṃskārobhyām |
analyzed: tatra a cam guru tvāt dvitīya ādauni tu guru tva saṃskārobhyām

original: teṣu mṛgalādiṣvādyaṃ karma gurutvādudbhūti tena karmaṇā  saṃskāra: kriyate tadanantaramunarakrmāṇi gurutvasaṃskārobhyāṃ jāyante dvayorapi  pratyekamanyat sāmagrīvidhāraṇāt ||
analyzed: teṣu mṛga lādiṣu ādyam karma guru tvāt udbhūti tena karmaṇā saṃskāra kriyate tad anantaram unar akrmāṇi guru tva saṃskārobhyām jāyante dvayoḥ api pratyekam anyat sāmagrī vidhāraṇāt

original: srotobhūtānāmapāṃ sthalā tridhābhisarpaṇaṃ yatta dṛḍhvatvāt spandanam |
analyzed: srotaḥ bhūtānām apām sthalā tridhā abhisarpaṇam spandanam

original: katham kṣanatādroṣa:saṃyoginā vayavidravatvaṃ pratibaddhya avayavadravatvamapekṣārthasama vetaṃ tenaiva pratibaddhamuttarottarāvayavadravatvāni saṃyukta saṃyogai: pratibaddhāni |
analyzed: katham kṣanatā droṣa saṃyoginā vayavi drava tvam pratibaddhya avayava drava tvam apekṣā artha sama vetam tena eva pratibaddham uttara uttara avayava drava tvāni saṃyukta saṃyogaiḥ pratibaddhāni

original: yadā tu mādyayā cetuṣeda:  kṣato bhavati tadā kṣamatāt pratibaddhatvādavayavidra-dravyasya kāryotpattau nāsti hetuḥ samīpasthasyā-vayavadravyasyottarottarabhāgavayavadravyāṇāṃ pratiba-ndhakābhāvāddṛttilābhaḥ |
analyzed: yadā tu kṣataḥ bhavati tadā pratibaddha tvāt avayavi dra dravyasya kārya utpattau na asti hetuḥ samīpa sthasya avayava dravyasya uttara uttara bhāga vayava dravyāṇām pratibandhaka abhāvāt dṛtti lābhaḥ

original: tataḥ kramaśaḥ saṃyuktānāmevābhimukheṇām tataḥ pūrvadravya vināśe sati pravakṣya-mānāvasthiteravayavairbhaṅgaṃ dravyamārabhyate tatra ca kāra-ṇaguṇapūrvakameṇa dravyatvamutpadyate tatra ca kāraṇānāṃ saṃyuktānāṃ pravalyena gamane yadavayayiti karmotpadyate tadu spandanākhyamiti ||
analyzed: tatas kramaśas saṃyuktānām eva abhimukheṇām tatas pūrva dravya vināśe sati pravakṣyamāna avasthiteḥ avayavaiḥ bhaṅgam dravyam ārabhyate tatra ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrva kameṇa dravya tvam utpadyate tatra ca kāraṇānām saṃyuktānām gamane yat karma utpadyate tat u spandana ākhyam iti
dravyasya kāraṇa tvam kathayati

original: kṣitīpsutānāmaṇāṃ sthalādiprāptiṣeṇaṃ yatnaddravyāt spandanam aṇau yaśa sthalādiprāptiṣeṇa tatspandanaṃ dravyā-nugrāhi ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: sthala ādi prāpti seṇam spandanam aṇau yaśaḥ sthala ādi prāpti seṇa tat spandanam dravya anugrāhi iti arthaḥ
katham iti praśnaḥ
samantāt iṅguna tvam

original: samantātu ṣaktau raupyaḥsaṃyoge kṛtsnasaṃyoge sati cakramavaddhine dravyatvaṃ pratibaddhaṃ spandanaṃ vā na karoti cakramayaddravyasamavekāryamavetaṃ tenaiva pratibaddhaṃ yasminprathame vācādoṣaḥsaṃyogo rakti tadavayavaprathamadravyaṃ tenaiva raupyaḥsaṃyogena pratiba-ddhamuttarottarāṇi tvavayavaddravyāṇi saṃyuktasaṃyogaiḥ pratibaddhāni raupyaḥsaṃyuktenā-vayavena saha saṃyogādavayavāntarasya dravyatvaṃ pratibaddhamiti |
analyzed: samantāt tu saktau raupyaḥ saṃyoge kṛtsna saṃyoge sati dravya tvam pratibaddham spandanam vā na karoti cakra mayat dravya samavekārya mavetam tena eva pratibaddham yasmin prathame vācā doṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ rakti tad avayava prathama dravyam tena eva raupyaḥ saṃyogena pratibaddham uttarottarāṇi tu avayava dravyāṇi saṃyukta saṃyogaiḥ pratibaddhāni raupyaḥ saṃyuktena avayavena saha saṃyogāt avayava antarasya dravya tvam pratibaddham iti
tad saṃyogāt uparasya pratibaddham iti anena eva nyāyena uttara uttara dravyāṇi pratibaddhāni

original: yadā tu mādhya hetubhedaḥ kṛto bhavati tadā samantāt pratibaddhasyāpyaviddravasya kāryotpattau nāsti doṣatareṇa hetunā samantāt pratibaddhasyāpyaviśo mahāparimāṇa-sthaikadeśakṛtenālpīyasā mārgeṇa nirgamāmāvāt hetubhedopasthasya tvapayavaddrava-tvasya vṛttilābho bhavati alpasyāpyadravasya tena mārgeṇa nirgatisambhavāt |
analyzed: yadā tu hetu bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati tadā samantāt pratibaddhasya api aviddravasya kārya utpattau na asti doṣatareṇa hetunā samantāt pratibaddhasya api aviśaḥ mahā parimāṇa stha eka deśa kṛtena alpīyasā mārgeṇa nirgama amāvāt hetu bheda upasthasya tu apayavat drava tvasya vṛttilābhaḥ bhavati alpasya api adravasya tena mārgeṇa nirgati sambhavāt

original: tasya vṛttilābhe śātarāmavayavaddravyānāmapi pratibandhakābhāvādvṛttilābhaḥ svakāryakartṛtvaṃ syāt |
analyzed: tasya vṛttilābhe śātarāma vayavat dravyānām api pratibandhaka abhāvāt vṛttilābhaḥ sva kārya kartṛ tvam syāt
tatas kramaśas saṃyuktānām eva abhimukheṇām

original: hetusamīpasthā uprayeḥ prathamamabhimukhīti tadvat tatsamīpasthastatastatsamīpasthaḥ ityevaṃ krameṇa sarve uprayā abhimukhīti te cābhimukhatvo na parasparapratibaddheśo abhi-karmaṇye drākṣāyanakramadiṅniyamañca|
analyzed: hetu samīpa sthāḥ uprayeḥ prathamam abhimukhī iti tadvat tad samīpa sthaḥ tatas tad samīpa sthaḥ iti evam krameṇa sarve abhimukhī iti te ca abhimukha tvaḥ na paraspara pratibaddha īśaḥ abhikarmaṇye drākṣāyana krama diś niyamaḥ ca

original: varṇanti kiṃ tu tathābhisaṃdhinta yathā parasparasaṃyuktā bhavantītyetaduktautanā|
analyzed: kim tu yathā paraspara saṃyuktāḥ bhavanti iti etat ukta autanā
themuktam veyūktānām eva abhisaṃdhi ṣaṇ
na
niṣadhi ṣaṇam iti saṃkhyāna antarā upalabhyate

original: tataḥ prāktanardhayogavināśe prabuddhaṣyavināśe  prabandhenādhiṣṭhitairadhaye: veyuktobhidaināptiṣyate|tadabadaidairva dravyamātmabhūte tacca  ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatveṇa dravyatvamucyate|
analyzed: tatas prāktana ṛdha yoga vināśe dravyam ātma bhūte tat ca ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tveṇa dravya tvam ucyate

original: avayavadravyatvebhyāṃ draurghatvarekhāvidhi  dravyatvamucyate tacca ca kāraṇānāṃ saṃyuktānāṃ prabandhena yasmane yadavayavini kramī|
analyzed: avayava dravya tvebhyām draurgha tva rekhā vidhi dravya tvam ucyate tat ca ca kāraṇānām saṃyuktānām prabandhena yat mane yat avayavini kramī
tyajate dravya tvāt tat syandanam

original: evamādayo gamanaviśeṣa iti||prāṇākhyai tu vāyau karme jñātmavāyusaṃyogādi-cchādveṣapūrvakaprayatnāpekṣājjāyate icchānuvidhānadarśenāt suṣupte tu jīvanapūrvakaprayatnāpekṣāt |
analyzed: evamādayaḥ gamana viśeṣaḥ iti prāṇa ākhyai tu vāyau tu jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt jāyate icchā anuvidhāna darśenāt suṣupte tu jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt
ākāśa kāla diś ātmanām sati api dravya bhāve niṣkriya tvam vāmana tva ādi vat adruta tvāt

original: mūrtestvanekagatadravyaparimāṇāt tadanuvidhāyinī ca kriyā sā cākāśādiṣu nāsti tasmānna teṣāṃ kriyāsambandho'stīti ||
analyzed: mūrteḥ tu aneka gata dravya parimāṇāt tad anuvidhāyinī ca kriyā sā ca ākāśa ādiṣu na asti tasmāt na teṣām kriyā sambandhaḥ usti iti
prāṇa ākhyai vāyau karme jña ātma vāyu saṃyogāt icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt jāyate iti
katham idam jñātam atas āha

original: icchānuvidhānadarśenāt dehakṛpūrvakādiprayoge tva-cchānuvidhāyinī prāṇakriyopalabhyate nākāraprayatnāviṣu rajāvi tadviruddhārthe prāṇakriyā dveṣādapi bhavati ataḥ prayatnṛtviśeṣyadapekṣate |
analyzed: deha kṛ pūrvaka ādi prayoge tu accha anuvidhāyinī prāṇa kriyā upalabhyate na ākāra prayatna aviṣu raja avi tad viruddha arthe prāṇa kriyā dveṣāt api bhavati atas

original: suṣupte jīvanapūrvakaprayatnāpekṣātsuṣupte prāṇakriyā prayatnakāryī prāṇakriyātvāt jāgrataḥ prāṇakriyāvat |
analyzed: suṣupte jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt suṣupte prāṇa kriyā prayatna kāryī prāṇa kriyā tvāt jāgrataḥ prāṇa kriyā vat

original: sa cecchādveṣapūrvako na bhavati suṣuptecchādveṣayorabhāvāt tasmājjīvana-pūrvaka eva niścīyate prāṇadhāraṇasya tantratvekṣatvāt |
analyzed: sa ca icchā dveṣa pūrvakaḥ na bhavati suṣupta icchā dveṣayoḥ abhāvāt tasmāt jīvana pūrvakaḥ eva niścīyate prāṇadhāraṇasya tantra tva īkṣa tvāt
catuṣu mahābhūteṣu an ākāśa ādiṣu kasmāt kriyā utpattiḥ na dvi nihitā iti āha
ākāśa kāla diś ātmanām iti

original: kriyatvaṃ mūrtatvena vyāptaṃ mūrtatvaṃ cākāśādiṣu nāstītyataḥ kriyāsatvamapi na vidyate ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: kriyatvam mūrtatvena vyāptam mūrtatvam ca ākāśa ādiṣu na asti iti atas kriyā sattvam api na vidyate iti arthaḥ
etat eva vivṛṇoti
mūrteḥ ityādinā
tad hetukam

original: svaviṣaye manasīndriyātmasaṃbandhamātre jāyataḥ karme ātmamanaḥsaṃyogādicchādveṣapūrvakaprayatnāpekṣāt anyābhiprāyasiddhyā ntareṇa viṣayāntaropalabdhidarśenāt |
analyzed: sva viṣaye manasi indriya ātma saṃbandha mātre jāyataḥ ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt anya abhiprāya siddhyā ntareṇa viṣaya antara upalabdhi darśenāt
suptasya prabodha kāle jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt
aparvaṇi karma utpatti parva karme ca ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt ahetu pekṣāt

original: kathamu yadā jīvanasahakāriṇordharmādharmayorupa-yogāt prabodhe'smītyābhimavo vā tadā jīvansa-hāgyorghvakalyāt tatpūrvaikamayadvaikalyāt prāṇāniśāne balyamyābhyāṃ labdhavṛttibhyāṃ dharmoṣadhībhyāmātmamanaḥsaṃyogabahāyābhyāṃ vratadhārīrādibhāgākāraṇamapavargeṇakṣamotpadyate|
analyzed: katham u yadā jīvana sahakāriṇoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ upayogāt vā tadā tad pūrva eka maya dvaikalyāt tad pūrva eka maya dvaikalyāt labdha vṛttibhyām dharma oṣadhībhyām ātma manaḥ saṃyoga bahāyābhyām vrata dhārīra ādi bhāga akāraṇam apavargeṇa kṣamā utpadyate

original: tataḥ ṣarīrādihirupagataṃ tābhyāmeva dharmoṣadhībhyāṃ bajurudrenātivāhikaśarīreṇa sambadhyate tatsaṅkrāntaṃ ca svagaṃ narakaṃ vāgatvā āśrayagurukapeṇa śarīreṇa sambaddhyate tatsaṃyogārthaṃ karmopasarpeṇamiti|
analyzed: tatas tābhyām eva dharma oṣadhībhyām bajurudrena ātivāhika śarīreṇa sambadhyate tad saṅkrāntam ca svagam narakam vā āgatvā āśraya gurukapeṇa śarīreṇa sambaddhyate tad saṃyoga artham karma upasarpeṇa miti

original: yogināṃ ca bahirantaścittasya manaso'bhipretadeśagamanaṃ pratyāgamanaṃ ca|

original: tathā sarvakāle pratyakṣeṇa śarīreṇa sambandhārthaṃ karmāhṛṣṭakāritam|

evam anyat api mahābhūteṣu yat kalyatra anumānābhyām anupalabhyamāna kāraṇam upakāra apakāra samartham ca bhavati tat api adṛṣṭa kāritam

śrami siktānām maṇīnām tad karam prati gamanam ca
ayaḥ ca uyaskāntā nisarpaṇam ca iti

ṣaṣ igrahaḥ iti

original: jāgrataḥ puruṣasya ṣaḍigrahe manasi ṣaḍrīre manaso'ndriyāntarasambandhārthe karma ātmamanaḥsaṃyogādikacchadradrapūrvakaprakṣepekṣānuvṛtti icchādveṣapūrvakaḥ prayatno jāyate|

original: yadā rūpaṃ jighṛkṣate puruṣastadā rūpaṃ paśyati yadā rasaṃ jighṛkṣate sadā rasaṃrakṣayati na bāntaḥ|araṇyakhaṇḍasyamantareṇa bāhyendriyasya viṣayagrāhakatvamuktaṃ tasmādicchādeṣupūrvakānāṃ pravṛttāntanavi kriyā bhūteti gamyate|

original: suṣuptu puṣuptasyendriyāntarasyanyāye prabodhakāle manavi kriyā jīvanapūrvaikapratyabhijñā-dātmanaive saṃyogādu|
analyzed: suṣuptasya indriya antara sya nyāye prabodha kāle manavi kriyā jīvana pūrvā eka pratyabhijñāt ātmanā eve saṃyogāt
capaṣapeṇa uti

original: ciciśātmanaḥ|saṃyogo jīvanamu tasya svakāryaikaraṇe yathoyamaiva saha-kāriṇo yadā tathāpanogād prabodho vināśo|nyonyābhimukho vā paramparāpatiba-dhyāt svakāryaikaraṇaṃ vā tato jīvanasahāyanoḥ yathoyayorvaitklye|abhāve iti tatpūrvaikapratyabhivekṣyāt jīvanapūrvaikasya pratyakṣasya vaikalyādamānāt prāgnā-yonityathe iti pacite usmin śarīre prāptasyāṃ yathoyayomyāṃ dehāntare phalaṃ bhojayitavyaṃ to|
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ tasya sva kārya e karaṇe sahakāriṇaḥ yadā tathā apanogāt prabodhaḥ vināśaḥ anyonya abhimukhaḥ vā sva kārya e karaṇam vā tatas jīvana sahāyanoḥ iti tad pūrva eka pratyabhivekṣyāt jīvana pūrva ekasya pratyakṣasya vaikalyāt amānāt iti śarīre prāptasyām deha antare phalam bhojayitavyam to iti

original: labdhavṛttiko bhavatohiṃkaśarīropabhogayathoyayopamativadgutvādu dehāntaropabhogyā yathopayathomyāṃ kāryaṃ na kṛtamu yadā tvehiṃkaśarīropabhogo yathoyamo prabodho tadā dehāntaropabhogayathoyayorvṛttilābhaḥ pratibanthābhā vājjñātaḥ tāsyoṃ labdhavṛttisyamohakṣaye dehāpabhogayāt karmeṇo|nyāyyāmātmama-naḥ|saṃyogasahāyasyāṃ punaḥśarīrātmanaive vibhāgākāraṇamapavargeṇakṣīyanyate|
analyzed: labdha vṛttikaḥ deha antara upabhogyāḥ kāryam na yadā tadā deha antara upabhoga yathoyayoḥ vṛtti lābhaḥ pratibantha abhāvāt jñātaḥ tadā deha antara upabhoga yathoyayoḥ vṛtti lābhaḥ pratibantha abhāvāt jñātaḥ labdha vṛtti sya moha kṣaye deha apabhogayāt punar śarīra ātma naive vibhāga akāraṇam apavarga iti
manaḥ samavāyi kāraṇamu

original: tatastadanantaraṃ tattvajño munuṣarīradṛhi-nirmate tāsyāmeva labdhavṛttisyā yathoyamomyāṃ ikāśayatyavetotivāhikaśarī-reṇa sambaddhūte tatpaścāntaṃ tadātivāhikaśarīraikāntaṃ manaḥ svagaṃ narakaṃ vā gacchati taca gatvā āśrayānurūpeṇa karmānurūpeṇa śarīreṇa sambaddhūte|
analyzed: tatas tad anantaram tattva jñaḥ tāsyām eva labdha vṛtti syāḥ tad paśca antam tad ātivāhika śarīra ekāntam manaḥ svagam narakam vā gacchati tat ca gatvā āśraya anurūpeṇa karma anurūpeṇa śarīreṇa sambaddhūte

original: svagaṃ narake vā gṛhagamanaṃ śarīraṃ taca tāvanmanaḥsambandhena bhavinavyamu anyathā tasmimu deśebhogāsambhavāt|
analyzed: svagam narake vā gṛha gamanam śarīram tat ca tāvat manaḥ sambandhena anyathā deśe bhoga asambhavāt
na ca ātma vat gāvyam eva manasaḥ deha antara sambandhaḥ usti avyāpaka tvāt

original: gaṅgaṃ ca tasyetāvadvarṇanaṃ kevalasya na sambhavati mahāpralayānantarāva-sthāyātirekeṇaśarīrasya manasaḥ karmobhāvāt|
analyzed: gaṅgam ca tasya itāvat varṇanam kevalasya na sambhavati mahāpralaya anantara avasthāya atirekeṇa śarīrasya manasaḥ karmaḥ bhāvāt
tasmāt nūtana śarīrasya anyā vat manudguvaṇa anupāta nikriyā yubhisaṅguṇa ādi prakarṣeṇa ustham ati sūkṣmam anupalabdhi yogyam śarīram parikalpyate
tat tu punaḥśarīram atikramya manasaḥ svarga naraka ādi deśa gati śad mathama ekatvāt ativāhikādebhī ucyate

original: maraṇajanmanorantarāle manasaḥ karme śarīroparaktairatyaivopapadyate mahāpralayānantarāvasthāmatikramankarmeṣyatiriktve iti manaḥkarmatvāt dṛśyayānaśarīradṛṣṭimankarmeṣu|sāmānyapadārthanirūpaṇam |
analyzed: maraṇa janmanoḥ antarāle manasaḥ mahāpralaya anantara avasthām atikraman karma iṣi atiriktve iti manaḥ karma tvāt dṛśya yāna śarīra dṛṣṭiman karma iṣu sāmānya padārtha nirūpaṇam
dṛśyate iti
tattva yoga arthe ca krama upasargaṇam iti

original: tena dṛśyaṃ nastṛ vā pratyakṣajātena śarīreṇa manaḥsaṃyogārthe kramopasargaṇamiti |
analyzed: tena dṛśyam nastṛ vā pratyakṣa jātena śarīreṇa manaḥ saṃyoga arthe krama upasargaṇam iti

original: yogināṃ ca bahirdṛdṛṣṭitasya bahirleṃ, khātisya manaso'bhimatadeśagamanaṃ pratyāgamanaṃ ca |
analyzed: yoginām ca manasaḥ abhimata deśa gamanam pratyāgamanam ca

original: tathā sarvakāle pratyakṣeṇa śarīreṇa sambandhārthaṃ manaḥkramodyuktāritam |
analyzed: tathā sarva kāle pratyakṣeṇa śarīreṇa sambandha artham manaḥ krama udyukta aritam
na kevalam etāvat na sarvam anyat mahābhūteṣu yat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām anupalabhyamāna kāraṇam upakāraṇa kāra khamathe tat api udyukta aritam

original: yathā saṃgīdāvaṇukrame cānivācyoprathodyuktāritaṃ, tathegamane mahābhūtānāṃ bhūyo'ṅkādrīnā ca prabodheṇa calanam |
analyzed: yathā mahābhūtānām ca prabodheṇa calanam
parīkṣā kāla ibhi śikṣānām prati gamanam
cakṣuṣā upi akānta anabhiṣayeṇa ca camaveta tvad yukta āritam iti
hita ahita prāpti parihāra prāptiḥ yat nibandhanam

original: karmeti paramaṃ tattvaṃ jñātaḥ kriyatā buddhi ||
analyzed: karma iti paramam tattvam jñātaḥ kriyate
iti bhaṭṭa śrī mīmāṃsaka kṛtāyām padārthapraveśa nyāyakandalī ṭīkāyām
atha sāmānya padārtha nirūpaṇam
sāmānyam dvividham aparam aparam ca
sva viṣaya sarva vegatam abhinna ātmakam aneka vṛtti eka dravya bahu tva ātma sva rūpa anugama pratyaya kāri sva rūpa abhedena ādhāreṣu prabandhena vartamānam anuvṛtti pratyaya kāraṇam

original: kathaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ sāmānyāpekṣaṃ prabandhena jñānotpattāvaśyā'pratyayajanitāśca saṃskārāvatītvātprabandhapratyavekṣaṇād yadanugataṃ nāsti tatsāmānyamiti |
analyzed: katham prativiśiṣṭam sāmānya apekṣam prabandhena jñāna utpatti avaśyā pratyaya janitāḥ ca saṃskārāvatī tvāt prabandha pratyavekṣaṇāt yat anugatam na asti tat sāmānyam iti
tatra ghaṭa ādau anyam param anuvṛtti pratyaya kāraṇam eva

original: yathā parasparaviśiṣṭeṣu camavastukṛṣṇalādidravyekasmā nīladravyā niṣasvasthāt nīlaṃ nīlamiti pratyayānuvṛttiḥ tathā parasparaviśiṣṭeṣudravyaguṇakarmedavaviśiṣṭā dravyāditi pratyayānuvṛttiḥ sā cārthāntarādravyavittu mahattvīti yattadarthāntaraṃ sā dravyati siddhā |
analyzed: yathā nīla dravyāḥ nīlam nīlam iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tathā paraspara viśiṣṭa iṣu dravya guṇa karma idava viśiṣṭā dravyāt iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ sā ca artha antarā dravya vid tu mahattvī iti yat tat artha antaram sā siddhā

original: sattānusambandhāt dravyāditi pratyayānuvṛttiḥ tasmāt sā vācyānyameva |
analyzed: sattā anusambandhāt dravyāt iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tasmāt sā vācyā anyam eva

original: aparaṃ dravyatvaguṇatvakarmetyādi anuvṛttivyāptitvāt hetutvāt sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca bhavati |
analyzed: aparam dravya tva guṇa tva karma ityādi anuvṛtti vyāpti tvāt hetu tvāt sāmānyam viśeṣaḥ ca bhavati

original: tatra dravyatvaṃ parasparavidhiṣṭeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvanuvṛttihetutvāt sāmānyam guṇakarmabhyo vyāvṛttihetutvāt viśeṣaḥ |
analyzed: tatra dravya tvam paraspara vidhiṣṭeṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu anuvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam guṇa karmabhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ

original: tathā guṇatvaṃ parasparaviśiṣṭeṣu rūpādiṣvanuvṛttihetutvāt sāmānyam dravyakarmabhyo vyāvṛttihetutvāt viśeṣaḥ |
analyzed: tathā guṇa tvam paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu rūpa ādiṣu anuvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya karmabhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ

original: tathā karmatvaṃ parasparaviśiṣṭeṣūtkṣepaṇādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayahetutvāt sāmānyaṃ dravyaguṇebhyo vyāvṛttihetatvāt viśeṣaḥ |
analyzed: tathā karma tvam paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya guṇebhyaḥ vyāvṛtti heta tvāt viśeṣaḥ
evam pṛthivī tva rūpa tva utkṣepaṇa tva go tva candra tva paṭa tva ādīnām api prācya pratīcī gatānām anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ

original: etāni tu dravyatvādīni prabhūtaviṣayatvāt prādhānyena sāmānyāni svāśrayaviśeṣakatvāttucchatā viśeṣākhyānīti ||
analyzed: etāni tu dravya tva ādīni prabhūta viṣaya tvāt prādhānyena sāmānyāni sva āśraya viśeṣaka tvāt tuccha tā viśeṣa ākhyāni iti
jayanti jagat utpatti sthiti saṃhṛti hetavaḥ
viśvasya parama ātmānaḥ brahma viṣṇu maheśvarāḥ
sāmānyam vyākhyai
dvividham sāmānyam param aparam ca iti
kṛta vyākhyānam an udduṣṭa avaram
sarva iṣa vemat sāmānyam iti kecid tad niṣedha artham āha sāmānyasya eva viśeṣa prāmāṇya nirūpaṇam
sva viṣaya vedanā ātmā iti

original: yatsāmānyaṃ yatra piṇḍe pratīyate sa tasya svo viṣayaḥ tatra sarvātmanā yato dharmavedaṃ khaśeṣa tatpratyayāt |
analyzed: yat sāmānyam yatra piṇḍe pratīyate sa tasya svaḥ viṣayaḥ tatra sarva ātmanā yatas dharma vedam tad pratyayāt
kha śeṣa vedana tva bhāve tu a tu upalabdhiḥ eva pramāṇam

original: kāṃcidātmaka(1)pramitratvabhāvādyyena svabhāvenaiva piṇḍe vartate  sāmānyaṃ tenaiva svabhāvena piṇḍāntare'pi vartate tatpratyayātviśeṣādatyayeḥ |
analyzed: svabhāvena eva piṇḍe vartate sāmānyam tena eva svabhāvena piṇḍa antare pi vartate tad pratyayāt viśeṣāt atyayeḥ

original: anekeṣu piṇḍeṣu itiyeśya tadvedakañceti kāṃcidasvabhāvamanekatra vartate iti ca pratītisāmarthyāt samarthanīyam |
analyzed: anekeṣu piṇḍeṣu tad vedakam ca iti kāṃcid asvabhāvam anekatra vartate iti ca pratīti sāmarthyāt samarthanīyam

original: nahi pramāṇāvagate'rthe kāṃcidanupapattināma dvitvādikāmayamitratvabhāvanekatra vartate tasmāt sāmānyasya viśeṣo na spṛśyate tathāhi |
analyzed: nahi pramāṇa avagati ṛthe kāṃcid anupapatti nāma vartate tasmāt sāmānyasya viśeṣaḥ na spṛśyate tathā hi
yaktra dravya buddhiḥ iti

original: sāmānyamekasmin piṇḍe draṣṭā: piṇḍāntare'pidṛṣṭaṃ vā piṇḍeṣvātmasvarūpānugamātprayaṃ karoti yaktrasya piṇḍasya draṣṭo'dṛṣṭenāṃ jñāpakatve yadi gauritipratyayasya bhāvād dvitvādikaṃ tvevaṃ na bhavatīti viśeṣaḥ |
analyzed: sāmānyam ekasmin piṇḍe draṣṭā vā piṇḍeṣu ātma svarūpa anugamāt karoti karoti jñāpaka tve yadi gauḥ iti pratyayasya bhāvāt dvi tva ādikam tu evam na bhavati iti viśeṣaḥ

original: anekavṛttitve vati yadekadravya svātmasvarūpānugamātprayayakāraṇaṃ tadṛ sāmānyamiti lakṣaṇāyoḥ |
analyzed: aneka vṛtti tve vati yat eka dravya sva ātma svarūpa anugamāt prayaya kāraṇam tat sāmānyam iti lakṣaṇāyoḥ
śabadā iva vivṛṇoti
svarūpa bhedena iti

original: yakasminnu piṇḍe yatra svarūpaṃ tatprapañcāntare'pi tatsvādevetyatho'taḥ pravacanenānupadameva pūrvoktaviśeṣāparityāgena vartamānaṃ khadṛṣṭavuddhipratyayakāraṇaṃ svarūpānugamapratītikāraṇaṃ sāmānyam |
analyzed: piṇḍe yatra sva rūpam tat prapañca antare pi tad svāt eva iti atha utas pravacanena anupadam eva pūrva ukta viśeṣa a parityāgena vartamānam kha dṛṣṭa vuddhi pratyaya kāraṇam sva rūpa anugama pratīti kāraṇam sāmānyam
katham iti parasya praśnaḥ
katham anekeṣu piṇḍeṣu sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ
uttaram āha
pratipiṇḍam iti

original: piṇḍe piṇḍe prati sāmānyāpekṣaṃ yathā bhavati tathā jñānotpattau budhyā yo'pyāsādayatyanena yaḥ saṃskāro janitaḥ tatsādanītasya jñānapravāhasya jñānapravāhasya pratyavekṣaṇāt smaraṇād yadanugatamasti tatsāmānyam |
analyzed: piṇḍe piṇḍe prati sāmānya apekṣam yathā bhavati tathā jñāna utpattau budhyā yopyā āsādayati anena yaḥ saṃskāraḥ janitaḥ tad sāda nītasya jñāna pravāhasya jñāna pravāhasya pratyavekṣaṇāt smaraṇāt yat anugatam asti tat sāmānyam

original: kimuktaṃ syāt yakasmin piṇḍe sāmānyamupalabhya piṇḍāntare tasya pratyabhijñānādekasyānekavṛttitvamavagamyate |
analyzed: kim uktam syāt piṇḍe sāmānyam upalabhya piṇḍa antare tasya pratyabhijñānāt ekasya aneka vṛtti tvam avagamyate
atas eva tatra bādhaka hetavaḥ pratyakṣa virodhāt upāsyante

original: yatpratyakṣamuktaṃ paramaparaṃ ca dvividhaṃ sāmānyamiti savidvāṃso bibudhya kathayanti |
analyzed: yat pratyakṣam uktam param aparam ca dvividham sāmānyam iti sa vidvāṃsaḥ bibudhya kathayanti
tatra param sanātana sāmānyam anuvṛtti pratyaya kāraṇam eva

original: yadyapi pratyekaṃ pratīyate sanā tathāpi viśeṣapadaṃ pratyanumānatvāh |
analyzed: yadi api pratyekam pratīyate sanā tathā api viśeṣa padam
yathā paraspara viśiṣṭa utpatti
tad tulyam

original: dravyādiṣu ṣaṭsvaditipratyayānuvṛttiḥ vyatiriktapratyayanivandhanā triṣeṣu pratyayānuvṛttitvād karmatvādiṣu (2) nīlādyānuvṛttivat |
analyzed: dravya ādiṣu pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ vyatirikta pratyaya nibandhanā pratyaya anuvṛtti tvāt karma tva ādiṣu nīla ādya anuvṛtti vat

original: yasmāt sanā ṣiṅgu dravyādiṣu pratyayānuvṛttiṃ karoti na vyāghnoti tasmāt sāmānyameva na viśeṣa ityupadehā-rāje: |
analyzed: yasmāt sanā ṣiṅgu dravya ādiṣu pratyaya anuvṛttim karoti na vyāghnoti tasmāt sāmānyam eva na viśeṣaḥ iti upadehārāje

original: apara dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādau anuvṛttivyāvṛttihetutvāt sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca bhavati |
analyzed: dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādau anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam viśeṣaḥ ca bhavati
dravya tve dravyeṣu anuvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt sāmānyam guṇa karmebhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ
guṇa tvam guṇeṣu anuvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya karmebhyaḥ vyāvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ
tathā karma tvam paraspara viśeṣaṇa tveṇa ādau anuvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya guṇebhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ
sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ asti iti āha
yat yam iti
prāṇi mātrāṇi sāmānyāni go tva aśva tva ādīni aprāṇi mātrāṇi ghaṭa tva paṭa tva ādīni

original: kiṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyavadbhūmau vāstavaṃ kiṃ vā viśeṣavadbhūpanā āhosvidbhumayavadbhūpanā abhāva |
analyzed: kim dravya tva ādīnām sāmānyavat bhūmau vāstavam kim vā viśeṣavat bhūpanā āhosvit bhumaya vat bhūpanā
yatnānti iti

original: sāmānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvādiṣu vidyate svārthasaṃvedī viśinaṣṭīti viśeṣa iti tu lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti|
analyzed: sāmānānām bhāvaḥ sāmānyam iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam dravya tva ādiṣu vidyate sva artha saṃvedī viśinaṣṭi iti viśeṣaḥ iti tu lakṣaṇam na asti

original: ata yatnān mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānyānyeva na viśeṣāḥ|
analyzed: atas yatnāt mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānyāni eva na viśeṣāḥ
viśeṣa lakṣaṇām tu upacāreṇa labhante

original: viśeṣo hi svārthasaṃvedī viśinaṣṭi dravyatvādikamapi vijātīyebhyaḥ svārthasya viśeṣaṇa, mi-tyetāvatā sāmarthyeṇopacārapravṛttiḥ ||
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ hi sva artha saṃvedī viśinaṣṭi dravya tva ādikam api vijātīyebhyaḥ sva arthasya viśeṣaṇam iti etāvatā sāmarthyeṇa upacāra pravṛttiḥ
lakṣaṇa bheda ādeśam dravya guṇa karmebhyaḥ padārtha antara tvam siddham
atas eva ca nitya tvam
dravya ādiṣu vṛtti niyamāt pratyaya bhedāt ca paraspara tad ca anyatvam
pratyekam sva artheṣu lakṣaṇa viśeṣāt viśeṣa lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ca eka tvam

original: ataevaparicchinnadeśāni sāmānyāni bhavanti tathā-pyupalabdhiniyamāt kāraṇasāmagrīniyamācca svaviṣa-yapravṛttāni |
analyzed: ataeva paricchinna deśāni sāmānyāni bhavanti tathā api upalabdhi niyamāt kāraṇa sāmagrī niyamāt ca sva viṣaya pravṛttāni
antarāle ca saṃyoga samavāyam utpattim āha ādi apadeśyāni iti

original: iti praśastapādabhāṣye sāmānyapadārthaḥ samāptaḥ ||sāmānyasya sāmānyasya dravyādyaniriktatvanirūpaṇam |
analyzed: iti praśasta pāda bhāṣye sāmānya padārthaḥ samāptaḥ sāmānyasya sāmānyasya dravya ādi anirikta tva nirūpaṇam

original: dravyatvādīni dravyādivyatiriktāni na bhavanti vyaktarūpaṃ pṛthaktvārthanirūpaṇanyāyasyanityathāha |
analyzed: dravya tva ādīni dravya ādi vyatiriktāni na bhavanti vyakta rūpam
lakṣaṇa bhedāt iti

original: caturṇāmākārāṇudravyāṇāṃ dravyatvādīni vyāccurnibuddhavedyānāñca dravyādivyatireka: tasmādeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ  lakṣaṇabhedāt pratītibhedād dravyaguṇakarmabhya: pṛthaktvāntaratvam |
analyzed: caturṇām ākāra aṇu dravyāṇām dravya tva ādīni dravya ādi vyatireka tasmāt eṣām dravya tva ādīnām lakṣaṇa bhedāt pratīti bhedāt dravya guṇa karmabhyaḥ pṛthaktva antara tvam
atas eva ca nitya tvam

original: yata eva sāmānyasya dravyādibhyo bheda: ata eva nityatvam dravyādyabhede sāmānyasya dravyādivināśe vināśastadanutpāde cotpāda: syāt bhede tu nārya vidhiriti pratijñate iti ||
analyzed: yatas eva sāmānyasya dravya ādibhyaḥ bheda atas eva nitya tvam dravya ādi abhede sāmānyasya dravya ādi vināśe vināśaḥ tad anutpāde ca utpāda syāt bhede tu na ārya vidhiḥ iti iti

original: athaike vadanti(1) bhinneṣvanugatā buddhi: sāmānyaṃ vyavasāyamiti sā ca pratipiṇḍaṃ dravyapuruṣādiṣu na svātantryeṇa(2) sāmānyaviśeṣatvena dve vastunī pratibhāsayati nāpi samerviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ gotvaṃ gotvavānityevamanudayāt |
analyzed: atha eke bhinneṣu anugatā sāmānyam vyavasāyam iti sā ca pratipiṇḍam dravya puruṣa ādiṣu na sāmānya viśeṣa tvena dve vastunī pratibhāsayati nā api sameḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvam go tvam go tvavān iti evam anudayāt

original: kiṃ tu tādātmyagrāhiṇī pratītiriyam caitrasyamatyakṣātmatoparāmaśād ubhayoranyānyagrahaṇena svarūpāntarasaṃbhāvāca catuṣtvatā hi gotvasyaiva sāmānyāntarasyāpi svarūpaṃ vyāghṛttasāpi gotvatve'thasantarāṇāmapi(3) svabhāva: sāmānyāntarasyānugataṃ tu gotvasya svarūpam vyasantaravyāghṛttiñca goṣakte: svabhāva: parasparātmatāmantareṇānyo(4) na śakyate nirdeṣṭum |
analyzed: kim tu tādātmya grāhiṇī pratītiḥ iyam ubhayoḥ anya anya grahaṇena svarūpa antara saṃbhāvāt catuṣtva tā hi go tvasya eva sāmānya antarasya api svarūpam svabhāva sāmānya antarasya anugatam tu go tvasya svarūpam na śakyate nirdeṣṭum

original: na ca tasya sa eva svabhāva: sa eva ca sambandho'tyupapadyate ni:svabhāvasya sambandhyabhāvāt tasmātsvajātisaṃyoga: parasparātmanaiva tattvam |
analyzed: na ca tasya saḥ eva svabhāva saḥ eva ca sambandhī iti upapadyate nisvabhāvasya sambandhi abhāvāt tasmāt sva jāti saṃyoga paraspara ātmanā eva tattvam
eva bheda abheda vādaḥ api

original: yathā hi śāvaleyo(5) gaurityatra pratīyate tathā bāhuleyo'pi |
analyzed: yathā hi gauḥ iti atra pratīyate tathā bāhuleyaḥ api

original: na cāsti kaścidvidvān śāvaleya eva gaurna bāhuleya iti ki tu sarveṣāmekajātirnaiva sa gaurayamapi gauriti |
analyzed: na ca asti kaścid vidvān śāvaleyaḥ eva gauḥ na bāhuleyaḥ iti ki tu sarveṣām eka jātiḥ na eva sa gauḥ ayam api gauḥ iti

original: tatra pratītibalena śāvaleyātmakasya gotvasya bāhuleyātmakatve siddhe śāvaleyādbhedo'pi viruddhyati |
analyzed: tatra pratīti balena śāvaleya ātmakasya go tvasya bāhuleya ātmaka tve siddhe śāvaleyāt bhedaḥ api
ayam eva hi sāmānyasya yat piṇḍa antara ātmaka tvam
idam eva ca sāmānya rūpa tvam yat ubhaya ātmaka tvam

original: bhedābhedābhekṣasya viruddhātvāti cet na yuktibaddhya bhavata: sāmatatvametadabhidhātum |
analyzed: ced na bhavata sāmata tvam etat abhidhātum

original: tadviruddhaṃ yad buddhiviṣayati yatra sarvedā pramāṇena tathaiva pratīyate tatra virodhābhidhānameva viruddham |
analyzed: tad viruddham yat yatra sarvedā pramāṇena tathā eva pratīyate tatra virodha abhidhānam eva viruddham

original: anyathaivana dṛṣṭamiti cettu kiṃ vai pratyakṣamavapi anumānādiva dṛṣṭamanuvādāt itye tattvaudānamaṃśasyatham |
analyzed: dṛṣṭam iti ced tu kim vai anumānāt iva dṛṣṭam anuvādāt

original: ayaivaṃ svārthamadhyāptṛ pravartate sadā yathā bahutsu yadṛdṛśyati  tathaiva tatu na svārthadṛṣṭamātroddeśena pratyākhyātamarhati sarvaprāptāsyātmānavasthṛtiḥ |
analyzed: sva artham adhyāptṛ pravartate sadā yathā bahutsu tathā eva na sva artha dṛṣṭa mātra uddeśena pratyākhyātam arhati sarva prāptā asya ātma anavasthṛtiḥ

original: tasmātu sāmānyaṃ vyāpramanyādavinābheyo'nyādavināpravatsyādvāsmantarālpa sthāne cātuḥsthānāt nityamanityaṃ ca na punarniruddheṣe |
analyzed: tasmāt tu sāmānyam sthāne cātuḥsthānāt nityam anityam ca na punar niruddha iṣe
artha prāptam

original: kiṃ jātisaṃjñayorabilakṣaṇāmākāraṃ gṛhṇīte tatpratīteḥ uta tayorabhede gṛhṇāti  cāhosvitu parasparabilakṣaṇāmākārau |
analyzed: kim jāti saṃjñayoḥ a bilakṣaṇām ākāram gṛhṇīte tad pratīteḥ uta tayoḥ abhede gṛhṇāti ca āhosvitu paraspara bilakṣaṇām ākārau
kāce kalpe tāvat ekam eva vastu syāt na ekayoḥ eka ātmaka tvam a bi lakṣaṇa ākāra buddhi vaicitrya a maida lakṣaṇa tvāt
dvitīye tu kalpe vyāhatiḥ eva

original: bilakṣaṇākārayorvatinaiva hi bhedavaiśiṣṭistasyāḥ sambhave  jñātiṃ tayorabhedagatipatteśca nāsti kathaṃ bhinnayorekadeva vyavasthāpyate kathaṃ  tāhi sādātmyapratītiḥ na kathañciditi vadāma |
analyzed: vilakṣaṇa ākārayoḥ vatinā eva hi bheda vaiśiṣṭiḥ tasyāḥ sambhave jñātim tayoḥ abheda gati patteḥ ca nā asti katham bhinnayoḥ ekat eva vyavasthāpyate katham sādātmya pratītiḥ na kathañcid iti vadāma

original: yadi tāvadeka ākāro 'nubhūyate ekasyaiva vastunaḥ pratītiriyaṃ naikayoḥ |
analyzed: yadi tāvat ekaḥ ākāraḥ nubhūyate ekasya eva vastunaḥ pratītiḥ iyam na ekayoḥ

original: atha dvāvākārā vanubhūyete sadātmyāḥ pratītirasambhava eva |
analyzed: atha dvau ākārau anubhūyete sat ātmyāḥ pratītiḥ asambhavaḥ eva

original: yatpunarāgaurityayamabhilāpo'nna  saṃvedanaṃ tatsamavāyasāmarthyāt saṃyoge hi dvayoḥ saṃyogemāvaḥ samavāyasya  punareva mahimā yadeva sambandhināvayaḥ piṇḍavadvivṛt piṇḍo'bhedavacca pratīyete  jātiśca na ca vyakteḥ svarūpaṃ tena satyapi bhede baṭarādivat kuṇḍasya  jātito vyakteḥ svarūpaṃ pṛthaktvena niścīyate parasparāpekṣārūpaṃ tūpalabhyotpakṣa  dūre gotvāyaṣṭake api piṇḍasya grahaṇāt pūrvaipiṇḍaprahaṇo'pi piṇḍāntare gotva grahaṇāt tasmādukterityanyaṃ bhinnameva sāmānyamiti tākikakāṇāṃ prakriyā |
analyzed: yat punar āgauḥ iti ayam saṃvedanam tad samavāya sāmarthyāt saṃyoge hi dvayoḥ saṃyogemāvaḥ samavāyasya punar eva mahimā yat eva sambandhi nāvayaḥ piṇḍa vat vivṛt piṇḍaḥ bheda vat ca pratīyete jātiḥ ca na ca vyakteḥ svarūpam tena sati api bhede baṭara ādi vat kuṇḍasya jātitaḥ vyakteḥ svarūpam pṛthaktvena niścīyate paraspara apekṣā rūpam dūre api piṇḍasya grahaṇāt pūrvaiḥ piṇḍa prahaṇaḥ upi piṇḍa antar antar antar antar anta
dṛ vi ādiṣu vṛtti niyamāt pratyaya bhedāt ca parasparataḥ teṣām anya tvam

original: dṛvyatvā dayaḥ pratyekaṃ dṛvyādiṣveva niyatāḥ pratyayabhedaścaiteṣu dṛśyate tasmāddṛvyādiṣu  vṛttiniyamāt pratyayabhedācca dṛvyatvādīnāṃ parasparato bhedaḥ |
analyzed: dṛvya tvā ādayaḥ pratyekam dṛvya ādiṣu eva niyatāḥ pratyaya bhedaḥ ca eteṣu dṛśyate tasmāt dṛvya ādiṣu vṛtti niyamāt pratyaya bhedāt ca dṛvya tva ādīnām parasparataḥ bhedaḥ

original: abhedātmakaṃ  sāmānyamiti pūrve pratisāmānyenoktaṃ tahidyānīṃ pramāṇairbhedaṃ karoti |
analyzed: abheda ātmakam sāmānyam iti pūrve prati sāmānyena uktam pramāṇaiḥ bhedam karoti
pratyekam sva artha yogi tvāt
lakṣaṇaiḥ eva eti

original: tasya pratyekaṃ  pratipiṇḍamabhiśāsedaikapūrṇāyāsāhādyape bhede lakṣaṇasya pramāṇavyāpāracca  sāmānyasya svārthayogaikatvamavi svalakṣaṇāviyogaḥ |
analyzed: tasya pratyekam bhede lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya sva artha yoga ekatvam avi sva lakṣaṇa aviyogaḥ

original: "svaviṣaye sarvaṃ sāmānyaṃ  samaveti nānyatreti yatvemuktaṃ tasya kāraṇamāha |

yathā uktā iti

original: nyāni yatha tatropajāyamānena piṇḍena sambandhādaparicchinnatve'pyanyaniyamate'pi tathāpyupalabdhavyāptyābhivyañjakatvādyavayavasthānaviśeṣasya niyamādviyatatvāt piṇḍotpādakṣaṇārambhātprāgabhautikayamācu svaviṣaye sarvaiva samavayanti nānyatreti |
analyzed: tatra upajāyamānena piṇḍena sambandhāt aparicchinna tve pi anya niyamate pi tathā api upalabdha vyāptyā abhivyañjaka tva ādi avayava sthāna viśeṣasya niyamāt viyata tvāt piṇḍa utpāda kṣaṇa ārambhāt prāgabhautika yamācu sva viṣaye sarvā eva samavayanti na anyatra iti
yatas tatram eva atra api

original: ḍākṣādisasthānaviśeṣe gotvasya vyañjakaḥ kaivaraḥ diṅsthānaviśeṣo'śvatvasya viciguṇādideśasthānaviśeṣo ghaṭatvasya pratītiniyamāt |
analyzed: ḍākṣa ādi sa sthāna viśeṣe go tvasya vyañjakaḥ kaivaraḥ diś sthāna viśeṣa uśva tvasya vici guṇa ādi deśa sthāna viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa tvasya pratīti niyamāt

original: yate ca saṃsthānaviśeṣā na sarveṣu piṇḍeṣu sāyāraṇāḥ api tu pratiniyateṣu bhavanti |
analyzed: yate ca saṃsthāna viśeṣāḥ na sarveṣu piṇḍeṣu sāyāraṇāḥ api tu pratiniyateṣu bhavanti

evam sāmasya niyamāt api sāmānya sambandha niyamaḥ

original: yatha hi tantvādīnāṃ kāraṇānāṃ svabhāvo yatraikatrapradhāne dravye paṭatvameva samavaiti nānyat   yatha hi pṛthivyādīnāṃ mahimā yatraiḥ kriyamāṇe dravye ghaṭatvameva samavaiti nānyatr na tāvat sāmānyamanyato gatvācyate śabdavyate nirjigamiṣatvāt |
analyzed: yatha hi tantu ādīnām kāraṇānām svabhāvaḥ yatra ekatra pradhāne dravye paṭa tvam eva samavaiti na anyat    yatha hi pṛthivī ādīnām mahimā yatraiḥ kriyamāṇe dravye ghaṭa tvam eva samavaiti na anyatra na tāvat sāmānyam anyatas gatvā ācyate nirjigamiṣa tvāt

original: tathāpi yadi pūrve nāśotr tatropajāyamānena piṇḍenāsya sambandho na syāt durutte ca sarvatropajāyamānena piṇḍena sambandhaḥ tasmāt sarve sarvasāmī|ta kṣaya cintanaṃ tatirāmbuvedrāh |

analyzed: saṃyogaḥ su anyatas samavāyasya bhavati saṃyoga avasthitasya vā bhavati tasmāt vijalaṇaḥ tu samavāyaḥ yathā yathā eva piṇḍa utpattau kāraṇāni vyāpriyante tathā tathā eva kāraṇānām sāmarthyāt piṇḍe nyatas nāgatasya samāśritasya api sāmanyasya bhavati vastu śakteḥ aparimeya tvāt ca iti arthaḥ

original: yadi śāba-tyādiṣu parasparanirapekṣamanubhūyamānaṃ na kiṃcidasti yathā gavāśvatvatayoḥ parasparavilakṣaṇāḥ khabedyante tathā go vyaktayo'pi khabedyāḥ syuḥ yathā vā govyaktayaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ pratīyante tathā gavāśvavyaktayo'pi pratīyeran viśeṣābhāvāt |

original: niyamena tu govyaktayaḥ pratīyamānāḥ ṣaḍbhyāḥ ḍajavīsādhāraṇasvakṣādivyāhṛtaṃ kiṃcidekaṃ hṛdayādivati yathārthamiyamākāṃkṣitvādikahetutvācca |

original: govyaktīnāmekatvamiti cet nākhati sāmānye vyaktīnāmiva vyaktihetunāṃ vyaktikāryāṇāmapi parasparavyāhananānabhikatvādasambhavāt |
analyzed: go vyaktīnām eka tvam iti ced sāmānye vyaktīnām iva vyakti hetunām vyakti kāryāṇām api paraspara vyāhanana anabhikatvāt asambhavāt

original: kiṃ ca yadyekahetutvādekatvaṃ mithaḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇāṇāṃ vyaktīnāmekatvaṃ na syāt dṛśyate cākṣicakṣurbhāvānumāni kāraṇamedo yathā cakṣurādinirvartanādidṛśāna śādityaprabhāstakṣobhisāt sūryakāntādau prayokṣyati: |

original: ekakāryatvaviśiṣṭe ca vijātīyānāmapyekatvāpattiḥ dṛṣṭāpi vāhyadehādikriyā gavādivyaktīnāmiva matsyādivyaktīnāmapi yā ca gotve dṛśyate na ca vāhyate ṣa gotve syāt |

original: api ca sāmānyābhāve ko'rthaḥ śabdasaṃsargaviṣayaḥ na tāvat svalakṣaṇaṃ tasya kṣaṇikasya khavedyo vyāhṛtasya ṣaḍgunirviṣayatvabhāvāt |
analyzed: api ca sāmānya abhāve kaḥ ṛthaḥ śabda saṃsarga viṣayaḥ na tāvat sva lakṣaṇam tasya kṣaṇikasya kha vedyaḥ vyāhṛtasya ṣaḍgu nirviṣaya tva bhāvāt
na api vikalpaḥ śabda arthaḥ tasya kṣaṇika tva ādi adhāraṇa tvāt

original: vikalpākāraḥ śabdārtha iti cet kiṃ vikalpākāro vikalpavyatiriktaḥ avyatirikto vā yadi bhinnaḥ sa kiṃ sarve vikalpasādhāraṇaḥ kiṃ vā prativikalpaṃ bhidyate sādhāraṇatve tāvadetasya sāmānyādabhedaḥ yadi pūrva tada jñānacaittayamasyākaṃ cā''śraye iti śaktimukhenaiva pratīyamānatvāditi kaiścidiṣyeḥ |
analyzed: vikalpa ākāraḥ śabda arthaḥ iti ced kim vikalpa ākāraḥ vikalpa vyatiriktaḥ avyatiriktaḥ vā yadi bhinnaḥ sa kim sarve vikalpa sādhāraṇaḥ kim vā prati vikalpam bhidyate sādhāraṇa tve tāvat etasya sāmānyāt abhedaḥ yadi ca āśraye iti śakti mukhena eva pratīyamāna tvāt iti kaiścid iṣyeḥ

original: yadi vyatirikto'yamākāraḥ pratijñānaṃ bhidyate athavā jñānādavyatirikta eva ubhayathāpi na śabdasaṃsargayogyatāsānavadyaścayavaṅgulatvāt vikalpaḥ paraspayeṇa tadarūpaniyatitvenyādvāharaṇasvarūpatayā svākāramāropya vikalpayati |

original: tenāyaṃ śabdasaṃsargī iti cet vāhyatvenāropito vikalpākāra ekārthīnaikabhāvatvāt vikalpe jāyamāne jāyamāna eva vinaśyati vinaśyanniva pratīyamānaḥ prativikalpaṃ bhinna evāvatiṣṭhate |

original: tatheha tantuṣu paṭa ityādipratyayānāṃ darśanāvaśyeṣāṃ tantupaṭādīnāṃ sambandha iti jñāyate |

original: iha tantuṣu paṭa ityādipratyayā: sambandhanimittakā: avayāvipratyayatvāt(5) iha kumbhe dadhyītipratyayavat ||na cāsau saṃyogaḥ sambandhināmayutasiddhatvāt anyatarakarmādinimittātsamavāyāt vibhāgāntatvādarśanādabhikaraṇābhikartavyayoreva bhāvāditi ||
analyzed: iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayā sambandha nimittakā iha kumbhe dadhyī iti pratyaya vat na ca asau saṃyogaḥ sambandhinām ayuta siddha tvāt anyatara karma ādi nimittāt samavāyāt vibhāga anta tva adarśanāt abhikaraṇa abhikartavyayoḥ eva bhāvāt iti
nanu ayam saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha
na ca asau saṃyogaḥ iti

original: casau tatpuṭayornāṃ sambandho na saṃyogo bhavati kuta ityacāha |
analyzed: tad puṭayoḥ nām sambandhaḥ na saṃyogaḥ bhavati kutas iti a ca āha
sambandhinām ayuta siddha tvāt iti
saṃyogāḥ hi yuta siddhānām eva bhavati
ayam tu ayuta siddhānām iti

original: tathā saṃyogo'nyatarakarmeva ubhayakarmaivaḥ saṃyogajo vā syāditi|
analyzed: tathā saṃyogaḥ anyatara karma iva ubhaya karma eva saṃyoga jaḥ vā syāt iti

original: iha tu anyatarakarmādīnāṃ nimittānāmabhāvo bhavetyādirakāraṇasāmarthyenā vidyāt|
analyzed: iha tu anyatara karma ādīnām nimittānām abhāvaḥ bhava ityādiḥ akāraṇa sāmarthyena vidyāt

original: saṃyogasya vibhāgāntatvaṃ vibhāgavināśatvaṃ dṛśyete na samavāyasya saṃyogaḥ svatantrayorapi bhavati yayoryorasthitayoraṅgulyoḥ ayaṃ tvabhikaraṇābhikartavyayoreva bhavati tasmādyāyaṃ saṃyogaḥ kiṃ tu tasmāt pṛthageva ||
analyzed: saṃyogasya vibhāga anta tvam vibhāga vināśa tvam dṛśyete na samavāyasya saṃyogaḥ svatantrayoḥ api bhavati yayoḥ yoḥ asthitayoḥ aṅgulyoḥ ayam tu abhikaraṇa abhikartavyayoḥ eva bhavati saṃyogaḥ kim tu tasmāt pṛthak eva

original: yathā bhāvasya dravyatvādīnāṃ svāśrayeṣu ātmānurūpa pratyayakartṛtvāt svāśrayādibhyaḥ parasparatattvādhīnatarabhāvaḥ tathā samavāyasyāpi pañcasu padārtheṣvahetitvapratyayadarśanāt tebhyaḥ padārthāntaratvamiti |
analyzed: yathā bhāvasya dravya tva ādīnām sva āśrayeṣu ātma anurūpa pratyaya kartṛ tvāt sva āśraya ādibhyaḥ paraspara tattva adhīnatara bhāvaḥ tathā samavāyasya api pañcasu padārtheṣu aheti tva pratyaya darśanāt tebhyaḥ padārtha antara tvam iti

original: na ca saṃyogavajñāterna bhāvabalakṣaṇaviśeṣāt viśeṣaliṅgābhāvāśca tasmādbhāvatvasarvaikaḥ samavāya iti ||
